name: The Jumping Sushi: Turbo
description:
Join BIG S on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump!
Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: Ninja Run
description: Ninja Run is a Runner style arcade game where the user leaps and dashes through obstacles to get to the finish line. Play and survive through 12 levels of as you complete your quest as a Stealthy Ninja.

name: Protocol Aftertime
description: Experience an action-filled third-person 3D platformer with mind-bending puzzles and foreign worlds in a story about hope and responsibility, reaching far in the past and beyond the future. Learn, to understand, become aware, to truly awaken.

name: Angel Island Tour
description: Sin descripción

name: NekoChan Hero Collection
description: NekoChan Hero Collection - a collection of games from the NekoChan series. The franchise is inspired by old school platforms like the Mario series. The collection includes three games: Ninja World 1 and 2, and Neko Land. The gameplay of all three games is an old-school platformer. The main character is a ninja kitty named Neko.

name: BraSonic
description:
This is the first game in the series BraSonic (aka BrazSonic) a Brazilian “recolor” of SEGA's blue hedgehog that was born to fight the corrupt villains of Brazil! This fangame recalls the best features of Sonic games, with lots of action and mockery!

Brazil was dominated by a strange force, commanded by a mysterious villain, who drove Brazilians crazy, not even the president escaped this one! BraSonic, who had pulled the rug from Sonic, was running around until he was surprised by an angry crowd… only then did he realize that he would be the protagonist, and that he is not the only one who is not dominated by the forces of evil.

On the way, BraSonic meets PeloTails, a gaucho fox, and BaiaNuckles, a cangaceiro from the northeastern hinterland, with whom he has disagreements at first, but who soon become friends and start to help him in his mission to save the country.

During the journey, BraSonic will pass through several scenarios based on places in Brazil, such as the city of São Paulo, the northeastern hinterland and the Amazon rainforest. There will be many challenges in the middle of the stages, coins and other power-ups to ensure your survival; more adversaries besides humans, such as folkloric beings and wild animals; battles against bosses and even Special Stages, to get the legendary 100 Reais Bank Note!

name: Minecraft Dungeons Arcade
description: Minecraft Dungeons Arcade is a 1-4 player co-op arcade machine adaptation of the Minecraft Dungeons game. For each paid play, the game issues a reusable physical card that can be scanned at the arcade machine for equipment and power-ups.

name: Just More Doors
description: Just More Doors is a horror-puzzle game filled with doors that take you to various liminal spaces. Exploring these spaces is your only chance of escaping this realm between realms. This world inside the world itself. This universe in which doors can lead to absolutely anywhere.

name: Hot Pursuit Challenges
description: Need for Speed: Hot Pursuit Challenges is a NFS Hot Pursuit 2 fan continuation for NFS Most Wanted (2005).

name: Stinky and Loof in Wonderland
description: Stinky and Loof in Wonderland breaks the mold for action-puzzle games, combining fun 3D visuals with compelling gameplay! Guide our heroes through more than 240 named levels, all individually designed, and all different. Discover hidden secrets, engage quirky adversaries, and solve a wide variety of ingeniously designed puzzles.

name: Knittens
description: No cat likes to look dowdy, darling! Help felines look their best by mastering this match-3 puzzler that transforms yarn into stylish outfits.

name: Monument Valley 2+
description:
Monument Valley 2+ is an Apple Arcade exclusive re-release of Monument Valley 2.

Guide a mother and her child as they embark on a journey through magical architecture, discovering illusionary pathways and delightful puzzles as you learn the secrets of the Sacred Geometry.

Sequel to the Apple Game of the Year 2014, Monument Valley 2 presents a brand new adventure set in a beautiful and impossible world.

Help Ro as she teaches her child about the mysteries of the valley, exploring stunning environments and manipulating architecture to guide them on their way.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Super Butouden 2
description:
Dragon Ball Z: Super Butouden 2 is a port of the SNES game of the same name, made by Hummer Team sometime during the 90s.

This is one of many pirated fighting games on the Famicom to use the Street Fighter II Engine. Unlike most Hummer Team games, it is in full Japanese as opposed to English. The story was completely removed from this version. However, the Arcade, Versus and CPU vs CPU modes are present. The characters are fought in a random order, and are always fought on certain stages.

The graphics and music are taken from the original game and simplified, with some characters sharing stages. Many of the stages themselves use multi-layered scrolling. The forest stage's theme, which is Bojack's theme from the original game, was reused in Tekken 2, another game by Hummer Team. The ending is taken from the original game, albeit without the credits.

name: Freelancer Life Simulator: Prologue
description: Freelancer Life Simulator: Prologue - a free game that contains events before Freelancer Life Simulator. In this story, you play as the uncle of the protagonist. You will find out why uncle left the city.

name: Keywords of A Life
description: Keywords of A Life is a text-based, story-driven game in which you try to find right keywords in order to unlock files and understand the story.

name: Log 141
description: Log 141 is an indie game originally developed as a high school computer science project. Inspired by text-based games of the past, this game was created to be played entirely within a terminal window. Traverse a text-based adventure filled with puzzles and mystery as you uncover the secret of Log 141.

name: Koumajou Densetsu I&II Premium Pack
description: A Touhou game with Castlevania-esque elements.

name: The Capri Connection
description: Sin descripción

name: Bomber Quest
description: A young man named Shounosuke sees a strange dream: a voice talks about mankind and its sins, and a beautiful girl begs him to save her... The next day, when he goes to school, an earthquake occurs, and he is miraculously taken into another world, where he meets the girl from his dreams. She says that girls in different dimensions are in grave danger, and Shounosuke has to save them...

name: Galt-Rio Maximum Position
description: A shoot-'em-up with more dialogue than most, just don't run into your wingman in mid-exposition... the graphics are all pretty nice, although it seems odd all the shots are simple yellow squares. Movement is via the arrow keys, X shoots, while Z purchases whatever power-up is available, Gradius-style, from the bar below.

name: Usagi na Panic
description:
Usagi na Panic is a side-scrolling action platform game released by Nihon Softec on Febuary 24, 1995 for the PC-9801.

This game is a cute and colorful action platformer which is divided into ten stages. The heroin uses a sword and has a range of various moves. Ramy can jump, is able to block enemy attacks with a shield, and can execute dash attacks. She can also throw projectiles which you can use to strike enemies from a far. Bombs can be set in order to trap the enemies, nonetheless with a limited number of use.

A sequel was developed on the same machine bringing some modifications to the gameplay, under the title Usagi na Panic 2 - Penpenjima no Hihou.

name: My Magical Girlfriends
description: You have the strange power to see the auras of others. One day, on your way to university, you come across a girl who exudes a mysterious rainbow-colored aura. You decide to follow her, only to discover that she is actually a… magical girl?! The girl introduces herself as Elise, and now that you’ve uncovered her secret, you won’t be able to go for free. You wind up helping her with her homework for her magic school, together with her two familiars. But stepping into a world of magic isn’t all fun in games, as you soon find yourself caught up in a battle between Elise and her not-so-friendly rival...

name: Welcome to Folklore Manor!
description:
Living away from your parents involves a lot of responsibility, but things become twice as interesting when you go house-hunting and meet some interesting new friends. They’re not just pretty girls—they’re yokai, spirits of the supernatural from ancient folklore!

Can you play the role of hero and save the yokai from an evil corporation run by greedy humans? And above all, will you make these girls fall in love with you at the end? Control your destiny in this thrilling yet romantic adventure!

name: Paqa
description: Paqa tells the story of a little alien (Paqa) that crash into a japanese city of our planet and finds a Pocketstation, the gameplay is most a simulation game since the player will have to talk to the alien using the Pocketstation. The game makes a full use of the Pocketstation device and that makes that is not playable in any emulator...

name: Granbo
description: Granbo is a RPG game released for the Game Boy Advance in 2001. It was only released in Japan. The game's story focus on a young boy named Kakeru trying to save the world through the use of robotic animals. Granbo was also released for Nintendo's Virtual Console for Wii U in Japan.

name: Ouma ga Toki
description:
Oumagatoki is an horror first person perspective adventure game that takes place during the summer of 2001 when Tatsuhiro Oka Yuutarou, a young man is chasing a woman (called Kyoko), who was running in Tokyo in the evening. When he catch her a sudden flash of light appears, and they are transported into the Edo Period. He lost his memory, and the player starts to go around the village and during the game he will recover his lost memories. The player will have to solve the mystery.

The game is divided into 3 chapters and when the player complete them a fourth one can be played. A save at the end of this game can be used at the start of the sequel Oumagatoki 2.

name: Pull Pull Pullpy
description: Pull Pull Pullpy is a free downloadable game for the Nintendo DSi, availible via DS Download Play. The game was created during the 2010 Nintendo Game Seminar. The game is about a yellow blob that is dragged with the stylus

name: Goice
description: Goice is an Action game, developed and published by Tenshindou, which was released in Japan in 1994.

name: Jankirou
description: Jankirou is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Fairy Tale, which was released in Japan in 1994.

name: Pandora Project: The Logic Master
description: Pandora Project: The Logic Master is a Strategy game, developed by NK System and published by Team Bughouse, which was released in Japan in 1996.

name: Raccoon Run
description: Play as a raccoon in this fun, stealth-based food retrieval game! Avoid rats and Animal Control while you collect food for your pack and explore the city of Scratchton.

name: Project Three
description: Project Three is a fan-made sequel to Half-Life 2: Episode Two, inspired by Mark Laidlaw's Epistle 3 script, which was adjusted and refined by fans to fit the cooperative story campaign.

name: My Sticker Book
description: "I can't sleep." A cute and possibly a little bit scary puzzle platformer game. Move stickers to the right positions in order to get rid of the monsters and complete the sticker book.

name: Fruit Girl Kiss
description: A beautiful girl with a bunch of fruit puzzles and you who are racking your brains to solve these mysteries, what kind of sparks will you create? Please wait and see!

name: Viking Life
description: You are an ordinary Viking. Your task is to gather a squad and attack other settlements, after each victory you will have a choice of 4 abilities, each with a unique pumping or talent. After death, you lose all skills and troops.

name: Royal Idiots
description: Royal Idiots is a medieval style third person battle arena. Fight others using weapons you have in your arsenal, or your bare fists. The game has 6 weapons to choose from all with unique abilities which can give you the edge in a fight, or are just fun to mess around with.

name: Dee Dee Planet
description: Dee Dee Planet was intended to follow ChuChu Rocket! as part of a series of Dreamcast network games, but was cancelled last minute. Lost for two decades, the final beta has been found and dumped online for you all to enjoy!

name: Orbit-Hopper
description: Orbit-Hopper is a clone of the video game SkyRoads (1993), a 3D racing and platform game. It provides full 3D graphics, a level editor, and multiplayer with split-screen.

name: The Legend of Alfur
description: Sin descripción

name: Abenteuer auf dem Reiterhof: Sonderedition
description: In this game you take on the role of Annie and your ultimate goal is to win the Kingswood Championship! Of course, before you can succeed, there is a lot for you to do! In addition to the training and many things to discover, the most important task is to take care of your horse. Because if you manage to win the championship, a real surprise is waiting for you!

name: Touhou Soujinengi: Zansho
description: Zansho (Lingering Summer Heat) is an expansion released at Comiket 79, 30th December, 2010. It introduces five new playable characters as well as new equipment, stages and quests. It also features new balance and skill animations.

name: OrbiTank
description: OrbiTank is a local-multiplayer tank game with a fresh spin on projectile combat. Use gravity to your advantage to shoot your shells in and out of orbit, hop from planet to planet, and dive bomb your enemies. Explore a vast variety of arenas which feature several gravitational mechanics such as planets, orbiting moons, spinning space stations, and even treacherous black holes.

name: Touhou Soujinengi Zansho: The Genius of Sappheiros - Shuumatsu
description: Shuumatsu (Weekend) features a heavy rebalancing of the rates for dropped items and Satori's Learning, changes some of the recipes (with the most notable one being the recipe for the Kusanagi, which now only requires 5 Iron as opposed to 30), removes the feature that made you lose all of your "unsaved" items after getting wiped out in a dungeon, and adds a few new things such as a mini-map and an easy mode you can toggle on or off whenever you want. On easy mode, you deal more damage, take less damage, your status effects have a higher chance to work and the experience penalty on killing enemies at a lower level is reduced. You can also now refight the final boss whenever you want during the expansion, which means that Kagami's Hyper Fang Crush is no longer permanently missable and can be learned by Satori whenever you want.

name: Gungho Brigade
description: Gung Ho Brigade is a Strategy game, developed and published by Tomy Corporation, which was released in Japan in 2000.

name: Shuyaku Sentai Irem Fighter
description: Shuyaku Sentai Irem Fighter is a 1993 strategy video game developed and published by Irem exclusively in Japan for the Nintendo Game Boy on July 30, 1993. It features characters from four of Irem's franchises: R-Type, Mr. Heli, Ninja Spirit, and Hammerin' Harry.

name: Woody Poco
description: Woody Poco, an 8-bit action-RPG about a wooden boy (or girl, depending on the version) who wants to become human

name: Samurai Aces
description: Samurai and ninja fly in the sky! Freaky Japanese-style shooter known as the debut of "Psikyo". We' ve got online rankings!

name: Greatest Drivers
description:
High speed driving action with pretty cars
Go ahead Be The Greatest Driver!

12 (cute) rally cars
Time attack in 4 tracks 8 layouts
Race against Replay data (up to 3 cars)
Realistic car tuning (over 1million patterns!)
And High Speed Drifting!

name: Hera: The Sword of Rhin
description: Sin descripción

name: Pastor 3D
description: Sin descripción

name: Zekkyou Senshi: Sakeburein
description: Zekkyō Senshi Sakeburein was a Nintendo DS game exclusively available to Club Nintendo members in Japan. This quirky multiplayer beat'em up forced players to attack by shouting key phrases into the DS' built-in microphone.

name: Rock'n Rage
description:
Rock'n Rage is an action shooter developed and published by Konami and released on arcade platforms in 1986.

The game is an action shooter game, the player plays as Rick or John and have to go through five mazed levels, each corresponding at one time era, Ancient Egypt, England during medieval times, France during revolution, Italy during roman era and Japan in modern days. Each of these levels concludes with a boss fight.

Players start with guitars only as their weapons, but finding potions on the ground will allow them to expand greatly their range of action, such as shooting musicals notes to destroy the various enemies the game offers.

name: Quiz Gakumon no Susume
description: Quiz Gakumon no Susume is an arcade quiz game developed and published by Konami released on 1993 exclusively in Japan.

name: Startling Adventures
description: Startling Adventures is an adventure game, developed and published by Capcom, which was released in Japan, 2001 for the original PlayStation console. The game contains three stories.

name: Martial Beat
description: Martial Beat is a game created by Konami for the arcade and PlayStation in Japan in 2002. It is based on the players' actions by use of wristband sensors. The game was shipped in a modified Dance Dance Revolution cabinet, with the sensors and the game's art on it. Although there are two sets of selection buttons (as Dance Dance Revolution supported two players), the game is one player only. To play the game, one needs to follow the on-screen instructor, and when a red light turns on located on top of the screen, the player must perform the move by repeating the instructor.

name: Koa: The Forgotten Gods
description: Become Kalena, a warrior who finds herself pursuing her revenge against the goddess of volcanoes, travel through the fantastic islands of the Pacific, seek the blessings of the Forgotten Gods and fight to dispel the curse that gnaws at you.

name: Wonderland Adventures: Mysteries of Fire Island
description: Mysteries of Fire Island is the exciting sequel to the award-winning Wonderland Adventures. Once again, the magical world of Wonderland is in danger. Travel to the mysterious Fire Island and unravel an ancient mystery in order to save the day.

name: Refuse: Home Sweep Home
description: Refuse: Home Sweep Home, a third person PC shooter originally released in Russia in 2006, has been translated into English and released for free.

name: Tokyo Stories
description: The city continues to tell her story, even after her disappearance.

name: Apathy: Gakkou de Atta Kowai Hanashi - Visual Novel Version
description:
Sakagami Shuuichi, a member of the school newspaper, is asked to gather information about the school's seven mysteries. He meets with six other students after school to listen to their stories.

This game is a visual novel adaption of the two novels "Gakkou de Atta Kowai Hanashi" written by Iijima Takeo. It features the novels' content with no branches, and an additional scenario called "Emi-chan no Sakagami-kun Kansatsu Nikki" (Emi-chan's Sakagami Observation Diary).

name: Apathy: Midnight Collection - Vol. 2
description:
Apathy - Midnight Collection ~Vol. 2~ is comprised of two parts:
The Kikoku no Shou edition of Apathy - Gakkou de Atta Kowai Hanashi ~Visual Novel Version~ and a sequel to Apathy ~Narugami Gakuen Toshi Densetsu Tanteikyoku~.

name: Antman 2
description: It's a 1998 Korean-made run'n'gun inspired by Gunstar Heroes, Metal Slug and Contra Hard Corps, directed by Hakkyu Kim, later of Ragnarok fame.

name: Run Run Kyousoukyoku
description: Run Run Kyousoukyoku is an arcade-style on-foot racing game. It uses a split-screen side-scrolling view and can be player against computer-controlled opponents or in a two-player mode. The latter allows players to choose any stage, while the former follows a linear set of levels, starting in Tokyo and advancing to the USA via China and Europe. The courses typically feature platforming sections alongside flat terrain; it is usually required to jump in a timed fashion to succeed, and jumps can vary in height and length depending on how long the player holds the correspondent key. Runners would also take falling damage in certain spots.

name: Danshikou de Atta Kowai Hanashi
description: Sin descripción

name: Apathy: Gakkou de Atta Kowai Hanashi - Shinsei
description:
Coming from 3 writers from the 'Gakkou de Atta Kowai Hanashi 1995' series and 4 from the 'Shou Gakkou de Atta Kowai Hanashi' series.

This work is a short novel that can be enjoyed by those who are new to the Gakkowa series.

name: Apathy: Shougakkou de Atta Kowai Hanashi - Getsuyoubi
description:
Welcome to Narugami Elementary School.
The Gakkou de atta Kowai Hanashi novels have finally become a visual novel!

New storytellers will appear in addition to some nostalgic characters.

name: Apathy: Arai Shouji
description: Sin descripción

name: Apathy: Gakkou de Atta Kowai Hanashi 2008 - Vol.1
description:
What is the truth hidden in the school?

Private Narukami School. This academy has a strange school rule that prohibits talking about the seven wonders of the school.
However, the newspaper club suddenly organizes a meeting of the seven wonders.

name: Mayonnaise Hole
description:
Get the mayonnaise in the hole!

With reactive string physics, 1:1 hand tracking, and a dynamic original soundtrack from Mustin (The OneUps) featuring guest tracks from Robbie Benson (Super Soul Bros.), experience the thrill and satisfaction of sinking a mayonnaise hole without tying a single knot. As you play, you'll travel to unique environments that pose added challenges. A moving hole, vertigo, wind, and many more surprises only possible in VR. Just how far does this mayonnaise hole go?

name: Arden: The World of William Shakespeare
description:
Developed by an Indiana University team led by Edward Castronova, Arden was intended as a platform both for conducting research on economics and social systems in virtual worlds and for educating users about Shakespeare.

The project was discontinued due to inadequate funding and dissatisfaction with the gameplay, with a release of what had been completed as a custom Neverwinter Nights module primarily based on Richard III.

name: There Is A Bomb
description: What if you had to stop a bomb in 60 seconds? But what if you were able to travel back in time to try again? Can you save the town from the explosion and break out of the loop?

name: Maptroid
description: A Metroidvania experienced entirely just in the map!

name: Minakata Hakudou Toujou
description: Minakata Hakudou Toujou is an Adventure game, developed by Thinking Rabbit and published by Atlus, which was released in Japan in 1997.

name: 1% Survival Escape
description:
You wake up in a closed room.
The criminal’s voice flows from the television.
You open the door, thinking you should escape...
But there’s a different room with dangerous devices.
Will you be able to defeat the criminal’s tricks and escape to freedom?

name: SantaCorps: Snow Patrol
description: Don the parka and shovel of the SantaCorps' Snow Patrol elf unit in this accessible arcade puzzle frenzy!

name: Mechanic Mechanica
description:
It's an action fighting game where you are able to customize your mech, similar in content to Custom Robo.

A prototype cartridge was found in 2021.

name: Super Mario Bros. 2 Christmas Edition
description:
Wart’s turned the tropical Sub-Con into a winter wonderland! As usual, it’s your job to track him down and put his evil plans on ice…

This patch adds a Christmas theme to the game by changing the graphics and some of the characters & enemies in the game.

name: Busou Renkin
description: Busou Renkin is an Action game, developed by Shade and published by Marvelous Entertainment, which was released in Japan in 2007.

name: Cold Way
description: “Cold Way” is amazing pixel adventure where you have to travel through the cold and snowy world.

name: Timberman VR
description: Timberman, the devilishly addictive retro-style arcade video game goes 3D and beyond. It’s now available in VR! Take a deep dive into a game that is easy to learn but not-so-easy to master. Discover whole heaps of fun in a brand new type of reality - a virtual reality!

name: Skeleton King
description: A role-playing nonlinear game. 1. Tomb robbing: obtain bones. 2. Summon: resurrect bones. 3. Battle: PK between players' skeletons. 4. Market: free trading skeleton. 5. Occupy: occupy the altar of soul power, absorb soul power alone, and upgrade bones.

name: Mad Trapper
description: In this Simulation of an Arcade Survival you can trap, hunt and explore, of course be on the look out for crazy critters, because they will be looking for you!

name: Planetary Defense: An Orbital Turret Defense System
description: 2D space shooter and turret defense come together to create the Planetary Defense this world needs! Shoot down asteroids and aliens and survive the bosses in this arcade like game featuring custom built satellites, projectiles and upgradable Cannon and Planet Shield

name: GG Land
description: GG Land is a place where all kinds of games meet together. And it also has a built-in game building tool! With this tool, you can create your own game in minutes without knowing anything about code or design!

name: Meliora
description: A local multiplayer tactical RPG board game, introducing 16 characters with unique passive and active skills, different game modes, a free for all or tag teams, save yourself or defeat your enemies, and build different strategies to claim your victory.

name: CRT7
description: CRT7 is an experimental music-puzzle game. Place pentominoes, play music, generate power, repeat. The more you play, the more strange devices you unlock, allowing you to solve escape-room style puzzles to explore further. What secrets are hiding in the dark?

name: Lua
description: Join Lua in this adventure that combines downhill and fantasy. Dive into epic descents and take challenging corners using the magical power of root-shooting. Help Lua face her fears while riding downhill on a longboard through the mountains.

name: Idle Campaign
description: Explore through Idle Campaign! A DnD inspired idle / incremental game about slaughtering enemies with a group of heroes. Once you finish one campaign you start another.

name: Egghead Gumpty
description: Explore an infinite procedurally-generated abandoned juvie as you try to survive a monstrous egg with legs named Egghead Gumpty that’s hiding in the building. He can watch you from anywhere, so catch him stalking you before it’s too late in this unique horror experience.

name: Escapers
description: Escapers is co-op, puzzle escaping game. Your only goal is to get away!

name: Logic Circuit: Marble Puzzle
description: Marble Puzzle to spend time, where you must fulfill up to 60 challenges! Move the pieces to create a path and get the metal marbles to reach the base of the board, you must make each of the bases fall a corresponding number of marbles.

name: Mission: Driver
description: Start the engine and become a legendary driver! Control a variety of unique vehicles with realistic driving physics. Master dozens of challenging missions and break all the records!

name: Fantasy Hentai Quest
description: Run and Jump in this 2d Platformer with top notch graphics and uncover a surprising narrative written in a innovative text light system.

name: Afterslave
description: Afterslave is a short visual novel about a boy that have reached culmination of his life in a totalitaristic country

name: Gamer Girls: Futanari
description: Gamer Girls: Futanari is a classic visual novel and casual puzzle game with and beautiful sexy scenes. You need to match blocks to pass level.After each passed level you gonna be surprised with unique sex scenes with our girls!All characters in this game are over the age of 18

name: Ghostkeeper
description: Ghostkeeper - the player controls a platform that can be moved by placing it under the bone, preventing it from falling on the skulls.

name: Virusum
description: As a friendly bacteria, you must fight a new dangerous virus in the body.

name: Warrior Maiden
description: Warrior Maiden is a colorful and enjoyable side-scrolling platform game.

name: Champs TD
description: Champs TD is a Tower Defense Game with endless replayability. Slay thousands of Minions in randomized Waves. Summon powerful Champions with 28+ unique Abilities. Earn Experience, Level Up and choose from 100+ Talents to improve your Champs just the way you want.

name: College Craze
description: College Craze is an adult dating sim and life simulation game. With a branching story structure, custom female character, and over 25 love interests, you'll find endless sexy possibilities for your own college experience at Sugardale U. You won't find any fade-to-black scenes here, so enroll today!

name: The Legend of Heroes in the Jianghu
description: The legend of heroes in the Jianghu is a martial arts open world role-playing game.

name: Spectre of Eternity
description: An action bullet hell. Dodge enemies attacks and collect upgrades to make it to the end of each level.

name: SCP: Containment Breach Remastered
description: SCP - Containment Breach is a free survival horror game based on the works of the SCP Foundation community. Your goal is to escape Site-19 doing whatever it takes to do so. Avoid tons of obstacles on your way to freedom.

name: Avorion: Into the Rift
description: In this hardcore add-on for space sandbox Avorion you'll explore the mysterious and dangerous Rift Dimension, which is unlike anything you've ever seen in the galaxy. Face its dangers, complete research expeditions and earn powerful new rewards.

name: H8machine
description: BIG INTERNET FIGHT 🤬 deckbuilder 🃏 posting simulator biggest cardgame innovation since the invention of sleeves 🤯 lore makes you go 🤪 then gameplay makes you go ‍🧠‍

name: TimeMelters
description: Prevent Doomsday AFTER it happened! Designed by the co-creator of Sang-Froid - Tales of Werewolves and featuring both a single-player and co-op campaign, TimeMelters is a strategy hero defense where you go back in time and fight alongside your past selves.

name: Jumanji: The Curse Returns - Welcome to the Jungle
description: You’ve seen the movie, now become the heroes of the game. Take your place as Smolder, Mouse, Shelly and Ruby. In this new expansion, working together as a team is more important than ever! Battle Van Pelt, restore the Green Jewel and save Jumanji!

name: Cosmic Cruiser
description: In this unique shooter from 1984. take on the role of a pilot of an out-dated Cosmic Cruiser, fighting to rescue the crew of a distant space station that had been captured by a raiding party from the sinister Rallom Empire.

name: Tanks Boom Boom
description: Set aside! The Mega-Tank is coming, destroying everything in front of him. Our advice is to join the tank cabin,using all it’s skills like : speed booster,time warp,money booster,otherwise you risk being eaten alive. Convince yourself right now that either you win or you are bound to lose.

name: Planetoids
description: Planetoids is a 2D hand-drawn game that is a retro space arcade game. In it you have to shoot and dodge meteors, comets and wandering planets in outer space.

name: Live Maze
description: Live Maze is a Twitch fueled game where viewers type !play to be entered into a procedurally generated maze! Players will see their characters battle each other through the means of weapons and power-ups. A lovely intermezzo for Twitch streamers who wish to engage with their audience in new ways!

name: Summer Pleasure
description: Everything is ready! The vacation you and your two best friends have been waiting for forever, and planning for months, is about to begin! A crazy week in a magnificent beach resort! But, as in the worst stories, your two friends ruin everything, and you are left alone....

name: Pink Explorer
description: Pink Explorer Is an Retro style 2D Platformer. Play as the Pink Explorer and try to beat all the different levels littered with sweet platforming, enemies, gravity puzzles and more!

name: Poly Memory: Primates
description: Cute, relaxing, polygonal memory game with primates.

name: Tiny Tactics
description: Tiny Tactics is a Tower Defence game with a heavy focus on mazing, with mechanics inspired by the Auto Chess genre.

name: Cat Dungeon
description: Cat Dungeon is a puzzle game where you must guide a cat out of a dungeon. Push objects to create a path to the door. Collect keys, pull levers and use teleports to escape the dungeon.

name: Eternal Supreme
description: To save her people from the world destruction, the supreme tried to breakthrough to the legendary supreme realm but failed! She is coming back. In this fantasy world with various traces, you will explore the race origination, recover the prehistoric secrets, and become the most powerful supreme!

name: NoAmmo
description: You are a tanker who has run out of shells, your rifle has run out of bullets, you are wounded and powerless, but you must complete the task, so despite the crowds of enemy soldiers, you continue to move forward, transferring your coordinates to the base and praying for a victorious end!

name: Some Synergy
description: In this local co-op 2D platformer game, you and your friend cooperate to reach the end. Two of you simply needs to progress right. With different platforms that provide different challenges, how will you and your friend progress?

name: Hidden in the Dark
description: You and your friends are going to spend a weekend at Amy's parents' vacation home. Mysteriously, they discover that there is a murderer in the house, and they need to act fast if they don't want to be caught. pronto

name: Drain Runner
description: Survive the ever-evolving hazards of The Drain as you rail grind, magnetize, blast and ground pound your way through this fast-paced action roguelike!

name: Go Home
description: This is a match 3 game with a dog theme. The game has an innovative goal achievement system. There are also four other types of mini-games. In the game, you help the dog find its way home. Cute puppies are looking forward to your help.

name: Lost Light
description: Join the "Firefly" task force and unveil the sinister plot behind the exclusion zone in the world of Lost Light. You could either scavenge for supplies or go out with guns blazing and plunder. Survive the brutal domain where danger lurks in every corner!

name: Unknown
description: Darkness. Nothing. There’s no memory of what has become. All you have is a flashlight to navigate the horrors ahead of you. Use your wits to solve the puzzles and escape the levels of the dreaded facility. You don’t seem to be alone though…

name: Voidcrisis
description: Voidcrisis is a four-player tower offense game on an undulating battlefield. Operate combat bio-machines called VA (Vital Armor) drawn with dynamic mechanical art shaders and work together to clear high-difficulty stages.

name: Lumba: Redux
description: Lumba: Redux Is a challenging, fast-paced, bullet hell shooter. Take control of LUMBA and cleanse this world of the monsters that have consumed it.

name: SharkDrag Episode 5: Uniting the 5 Kingdoms
description: A 2D classic RPG style game with unique custom-made monsters. Travel across the continent of Penta, fighting a variety of hostile creatures, and gathering allies as you go. A not too serious adventure awaits!Made in RPGMaker VX Ace, by a two person team.

name: Survivor of the Journey
description: Survivos of the Journey is a survival game with rogue-like elements Survive in countless fantasy monsters Grow faster than the enemy that comes and knock them down Survive to the end and defeat the boss. Failed? Use your stuff to be strong. Can't you? Let's try our luck this time.

name: Icarus Challenge
description: Fly around the beautiful island on your own and feel the free! To fly, you only have to spread your arms and flap. No need to use joy stick or keep looking in the direction of travel. If you can fly as you wish, let's challenge "Icarus challenge". It is simple. fly higher than anyone else!

name: The Twenty One
description: 《灵魂筹码:契约》是一款生存恐怖对战游戏。这是一场一旦坐上牌桌便无法回头的赌局，为了取胜所要付出的代价远超想象，你需要通过合作才能逃离这越陷越深的泥潭。不过要小心，你将面对的敌人并不只有恶灵，而你要合作的也不仅仅是人类同伴……

name: Rise of the Ghostdom
description: Rise of the ghostdom is a medieval realistic open world game, the game uses the dialogue system to complete the exploration mission, in the combat system can bring you a different experience of the blow, the whole game gives you a realistic open world, you do not have to worry about doing the task,

name: Wani Wani Attack
description: It will be a game to play with an air gun using ST32 and ST32R to be sold. Of course, you can also play with the mouse. Repel the crocodile attacking from the back of the bridge! Do not harm any creature other than the crocodile. Defeat a lot of crocodiles and get a high score.

name: Phantom Zone: Talon Fictions
description: Sin descripción

name: 7 Horizons
description: BOOM! Shoot your way to saving the galaxy in an epic quest beyond the 7th horizon. Exciting platform challenges with shooter elements – all with a comic book atmosphere, humor, and beautiful hand-drawn graphics!

name: Abigor
description: Abigor is a third-person action RPG where you play as Alric, a demon hunter at Alastor Academy who must overcome incredible odds to protect his school from demonkind. Combat features traditional melee combat with dodging, but also a magic stance system which changes the players attacks.

name: The Battles for Abunka
description: Sin descripción

name: A Castle Full of Cats
description: A Castle Full of Cats is a catvania hidden object game were you need to find all the cursed cats in the castle. Save each and every cat and unleash the power of love!

name: Acceptance
description: A story-driven psychological thriller about the horrific consequences of a loved one's suicide.

name: Amber Island
description: Amber Island is an open world creature collector where you explore the wilderness to hunt and tame creatures. Anticipate and counter your opponent with defensive moves in strategic battles and tournaments. Explore new lands each filled with new challenges and creatures to collect and breed.

name: Amber City
description: A girl in a white dress wakes up in a ruined city. She uses her light to light up mysterious cocoons, reverse time, and restore the city to its former splendor. You take on the role of this mysterious girl. As you restore Amber City, more and more of its history will unfurl before you.

name: Almost My Floor: Duality
description: Almost My Floor: Duality - a noir detective horror-adventure game about the internal struggle with depression and the impending darkness in a provincial town. The gameplay is based on decision-making mechanics and a branching storyline.

name: All World Pro Wrestling: Bonus Stories 2
description: Get into those tight trunks and charge into the ring with three more smoking-hot stories of gay wrestling erotica! See the All World Pro Wrestling League at its best: gorgeous men, tight clinches, flexing muscles, and sexual tension in every move.

name: All in your head
description: You are left behind to spend the night in a cabin that was meant to be a destination launch party. The cabin is located in a beautiful & secluded hill of the country-side. But seclusion can also mean unchartered territories and paranormal activity.

name: Police Simulator: Patrol Officers - Steelbook Edition
description: Welcome to Brighton! Join the police force of this fictitious American city and experience the day to day life of a police officer.

name: Bus Simulator City Ride
description: Take the driver’s seat as you transport passengers around a lively city in officially licensed buses from famous manufacturers: Alexander Dennis, Blue Bird, BYD, IVECO BUS, MAN, Mercedes-Benz, Scania, Setra, Volvo, and Vicinity Motor Corp. Drive the routes and complete campaign missions to unlock even more buses, districts, and routes. Climb the career ladder and establish a public transport network for your city.

name: Flashback 2: Limited Edition
description:
The Limited Edition of Flashback 2 includes
- The game
- An exclusive Steelbook
- The digital soundtrack

name: Winter Games 2023
description: Winter Games 2023 is an exciting sports game in a modern 3D guise. The player can prove his/her athletic abilities in ten dynamic winter sports disciplines, for example, ski jumping, biathlon, ski cross, skeleton, or super-G. Set off on the hunt for records, best times, and trophies. Besides the individual disciplines there are also ready-to-play cups to choose from in which several disciplines can be played one after the other, and customized competitions you can put together yourself. Play alone against AI or compete in local multiplayer mode against up to three friends in an exciting winter sports duel.

name: Raiden IV x Mikado Remix: Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition includes:
- The game
- A Voucher for the Digital Soundtrack
- Poster

name: Horse Club Adventures 2: Hazelwood Stories
description: Saddled, up and away! Ride together with the girls from Horse Club and discover a colorful world full of adventure.

name: Sword and Fairy: Together Forever - Premium Collector’s Edition
description:
The Premium Collector's Edition includes:
- Collector's Edition Box
- Reversible Cover
- Steelbook Cover
- Clipboard Character Standees
- Soundtrack and DLC Skins Digital Download Code
- Original Soundtrack CD
- Leaf Fairy Plushie
- Postcard Set of 4
- Journey Heaven-Earth Playing Cards

name: Company of Heroes 3: Premium Edition
description:
Premium Edition includes;
- Premium big box
- Metal case
- Double sided map
- Devil's Brigade embroidered patch
- Premium pocket compass
- Premium service medal
- Collector's book,
- Premium DLC Pack,
- Devil's Brigade DLC Pack

name: Cuphead & The Delicious Last Course
description: A second helping of Cuphead action awaits on a brand new Inkwell Isle filled with boss battles, secrets, and adventure galore!

name: My Universe: Puppies and Kittens - Panda Edition
description:
My Universe: Puppies and Kittens - Panda Edition new content:

- New missions to discover
- Improved graphics
- New treatments and mini-games to help your little patients
- 2 new dog breeds & 2 new cat breeds: Dalmatian, Border Collie, Abyssinian, and Devon Rex
- After completing your various missions, you will unlock a mysterious patient seeking expert veterinarian advice

name: Boku wa Chiisai
description: Boku wa Chiisai is an Action game, published by Victor Interactive Software, which was released in Japan in 2002.

name: Forrader Hero
description: Forrader Hero – turn-based roguelike dungeon crawler where heroes can’t step back and must fight through the end to save their soul in ‘Forgotten Proto.World’ fighting hordes of monsters, undead creatures, and their overlords.

name: My First Date RPG: Elliot - Story One
description: Sin descripción

name: The Jumping Nuggets
description: Join BIG N on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump! Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: The Jumping Nuggets: Turbo
description: The Jumping Nuggets: Turbo is a clicker game. See how many times you can jump the nugget!

name: The Jumping Pizza: Turbo
description:
Join BIG P on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump!
Enjoy the colourful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: The Giraffe G
description: The clicking adventure you and your friends need. Eat leaves with the main hero of the game The Giraffe G and eat all the leaves in the world!

name: Weben Blocks 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Vump Jump
description: Join Vump on journey through dangerous swamp. On your way you will face several obstacles and challenges that will put your abilities to test. If you overcome them you might be able to save Vump.

name: Welcome to Mark's Story in the World of Project: Summer Ice
description: Sin descripción

name: Welcome to Pammy's Story in the World of Project: Summer Ice
description: Sin descripción

name: Space Kabaam 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Witchcraft: The Lotus Elixir
description: Are you ready to meet your fate? Embark on an uncanny adventure as the Witch Apprentice in Witchcraft – The Lotus Elixir, a hidden object adventure that calls out your buried talents and magic.

name: Four Seasons Around the World: Spring in Japan
description: Discover Japanese culture in Spring by following the story of a young American journalist in search for love and adventure. After receiving a mysterious letter, the young woman goes to Japan to follow more clues. In hope of finding her lost love, she is enriched by the culture of the Far East. Choose your own level of challenge. Play 80 mosaic puzzles and enjoy various Minigames. Follow instructions for the tea ceremony, ikebana and sushi rolls. Enjoy Japanese landscape as you progress in the game.

name: Superpanda 2
description: Superpanda comes back in a whole new adventure, full of dangers, epic quests and monstrous bosses.

name: Circus Electrique: Deluxe Edition
description: Step right up to the Circus Electrique Deluxe Edition! Complete with thrilling digital bonus items: Original Soundtrack, Digital Artbook & Game Maps.

name: The Riftbreaker: Deluxe Edition
description: The Riftbreaker Deluxe Edition contains the core game and all available addons.

name: Phoenix Point: Complete Edition
description: Phoenix Point: Complete Edition, the acclaimed strategy game from the creator of X-COM, is now assembled into the ultimate collection, including all DLCs, content updates, and product improvements over four years of development.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Gladius - Relics of War: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Cossacks 3: Digital Deluxe
description: Sin descripción

name: Slave Zero X
description: Slave Zero X is a stylish 2.5D character action game set in the biopunk world of Slave Zero (1999). Run & Slash your way through a dystopian future in this character action game which will resonate with fans of Devil May Cry, Strider, and Guilty Gear.

name: Pathfinder: Kingmaker - Noble Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Pathfinder: Kingmaker - Royal Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: ΔV: Rings of Saturn - Space Furry Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Xel: Save the World Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Showgunners
description: As a contestant on a brutal reality game show of the future, you must survive a deadly urban environment packed with lethal traps, confounding puzzles, and murderous, heavily armed psychopaths. Turn-based combat in hand crafted levels, built for entertainment.

name: Kane & Lynch 2: Dog Days - Complete Edition
description:
Kane & Lynch 2: Dog Days - Complete Edition includes:

- Kane & Lynch 2: Dog Days
- Kane & Lynch 2: The Doggie Bag DLC
- Kane & Lynch 2: Alliance Weapon Pack DLC
- Kane & Lynch 2: Multiplayer Masks Pack DLC

name: North Frontier
description: North Frontier is an exciting real-time strategy game where you have to explore new lands, build cities in harsh conditions and develop them! Mine for minerals, build factories, institutes and get rewards for completing your plan!

name: Come Together
description: A Puzzle-Adventure game where your main goal is to connect 2 squares together. Solve puzzles, explore and find items and secrets, overcome difficult challenges, complete side quests and make friends, learn new mechanics and use all your knowledge to lead your way to success!

name: Demolish & Build 3
description: In Demolish & Build 3 you play as the owner of a demolition company. Accept contracts and complete them yourself or delegate them to your workers. Use powerful equipment, from sledgehammers to giant cranes. Manage your company by hiring workers and buying new vehicles and properties.

name: Polyhedron: Tales from Krasnoslavia
description: Polyhedron: tales from Krasnoslavia is a fast-paced FPS in an Eastern European cyberpunk setting. You are waiting for cool guns, lots of unique abilities, varied gameplay and much more.

name: Heroes Lineage
description:
Heroes Lineage is a skill-based NFT RPG game with a medieval fantasy theme.
Travel to the world of Ethernia, help the citizens by completing daily missions or go to the arena and compete in intense and strategic 1v1 combat.
There is also content for group of players. Gather your friends and defeat powerful World Bosses!

name: No More Fathers
description: Set off on a high flying, exploration and puzzling adventure game. A journey set high above the clouds, in a mysterious world full of unexplored islands, dark spirits, caves, people with stories to share, and a boy looking for answers to the questions of a fatherless life, led by an ancient wind.

name: Right Nice Party
description: Right Nice Party is a playful, family-friendly and strategic party game with cheerful characters and a colorful world. Take over locations and build up your influence in the refreshingly new Conquest Mode and battle your friends in engaging mini-games between rounds!

name: Eidols
description: Eidols is a psychedelic survival game, set in an alien landscape. As you survive your creature will adapt to your actions, and as you die the life you lived will affect your future creatures. Features deep lore, a wide variety of different abilities, and multiplayer servers to explore it all on.

name: Giant Worm Rider
description: Giant Worm Rider is a VR worm riding game with a retro aesthetic. Swing on the back of a giant worm and experience the immersive sci-fi setting in virtual reality.

name: Legends of Crystal
description: Legends of Crystal is a turn-based RPG that blends two cultures, namely Nusantara and Japan. It tells the story of a child chosen by a god who must save a crystal from evil. The crystal is divided into 6 powers due to the greed of jinns and mythical creatures in the past.

name: MoonFire: A Seeker's Saga
description: Become the deciding factor between fate and ruin. MoonFire: A Seeker's Saga is a narrative-driven RPG where choices impact character, combat and consequence. In a world of celestial magic and violence-devoted talking animals, the only reality may be to perish or persevere.

name: Spread
description: Spread is a horror platformer with a unique 2D art style and a gripping storyline. Help Little Viny find her mother and escape from this creepy hotel...

name: Eleven Sunrises
description:
Eleven Sunrises is an open world exploration and survival RPG/Tower Defense.

Explore and conquer new territories. During this trip, you will find the food and weapons necessary for your survival.

name: Barista: Rise and Grind
description: RISE to the top in this cozy third-wave barista simulation game. GRIND to be the best barista by roasting, brewing and serving customers the best coffee possible. Buy equipment to unlock new recipes and customize your café’s layout, branding and decor to manage the business how you want!

name: Fairmoon Museum
description: Start your life as a curator in Fairmoon where you'll fix up and fill up a museum in a sleepy town full of interesting residents with lots to say. Customize your character, improve your house and local businesses, and get to know more about this curious little town.

name: Anima Island
description: You awake on an unknown island full of strange inhabitants and powerful creatures called anima. Train anima and fight with them to unite the island's inhabitants against a dark force that looms inside the island.

name: Western City Renovator
description: Welcome to western city simulator Discover and restore abandoned cities and locations. Complete missions and assignments for Western Rail Company on a planned railroad route. Bring back to live ghost towns and solve the problems of the Wild West. Build your dream western city.

name: Aria's Melody
description: Aria's Melody is a 2D action-adventure game inspired by retro classics. In this game you will travel across a vast world in search of answers to the darkness that plagues the lands.

name: Soul of Kaeru
description: Soul of Kaeru is a Metroidvania-inspired VR game! Explore each corners of a miniature world set in an ancient samurai's zen garden where nature took back his right! But beware of the little creatures and insects, as they may not be as friendly as you would think...

name: Shadow's Light
description: Shadow's Light is an atmospheric 3D puzzle platformer about a child refugee and their shadow, trying to survive across two different planes of existence, while solving puzzles by travelling across multiple universes, and traversing levels by casting physically interactable shadows.

name: Vampiric Crown
description: Vampiric Crown is a side-scrolling action RPG set in a strange gothic world. A young vampire girl decides to rebel against her race, upon discovering that her sister will be the victim of a macabre plan to unearth the prince of darkness ...

name: Insane Town
description: The key elements of the game will be ingenuity and teamwork in order to understand other players’ roles, implement strategies, kill opponents, disguise themselves and resist until time runs out.

name: Swelter
description: Swelter is a story-driven mod, which takes place several years before the events of Half-Life 2, and tells about the internal contradictions within the Resistance forces that arose during the rebellion against the Combine in the post-Soviet city of Central Asia, surrounded by a hot steppe.

name: Marscape
description: A survival management simulator on the red planet. Make sure your astronauts survive on Mars. Manage and expand your habitat. Produce enough resources, build facilities, explore the environment and brave the harsh weather until you are rescued.

name: Ending Tau
description: Morph every part of your body with powerful curses. Survive in a fast-paced roguelite world with different mechanics on every journey. Explore an untouched land inspired by a lost folk tale. Set your tribe free by Ending Tau.

name: Emberbane
description: Emberbane is a pixel action-platformer with combat revolving around a mixture of four elements with unique abilities. Join Ophelia on her journey to slay the malevolent gods of elements and bring equilibrium to the land; use the elementals to your advantage and uncover the untold tale of centuries.

name: Ready for Riot
description: Immerse into real, hard american prison riot and test out yourself as a member of the police force. Do you have what it takes to control and recapture most danegrous convicts in the world?

name: Frozen Friday Night: The Eve
description: The young's holidays become a nightmare.

name: Deer Nightmare
description: Deer Nightmare - A 2D runner in which the player dodges approaching deer that can run over the girl, and the player who takes control tries to prevent this by collecting medicines and accumulating distance points. Game Features:

name: Territorial Duck
description: Chase away thousands of nosy animals from your pond while keeping your sanity! Then decorate your pond with flora and cute things you've shamelessly stolen. In this 2D Rogue-lite you live life a duck getting exponentially more powerful for each item you steal.

name: Jurassic Architect
description: Jurassic Architect is a strategy game set in the not-so-distant future, from which humanity, thanks to the achievements of technology, escapes from a polluted and destroyed world to the age of the dinosaurs in order to be able to create a new civilization.

name: Reign Over
description: Build a fortress, raise an army, conquer your rivals! Hire heroes, equip them with rare artifacts and master their special abilities. Capture buildings and resources to train units and hire mercenaries. Lead them to victory in turn based combat!

name: Specteared
description: Survival Horror with innovative mechanics. Custom procedural algorithms providing unique experience for each playthrough. Lot's of organic, procedural animation. Simulation of sound waves bouncing in facilities to help identify danger in really immersive way.

name: Fantome
description: Fantôme is a multiplayer (5 vs 1) psychological - horror game where you play with friends to Escape or as a Grifter, betray your friends and offer them as a sacrifice, to win.

name: Super Demon Survivors
description: Super Demon Survivors is a homage to time survival reverse bullet hells, set in a familiar world pitting multiple characters against hordes of demons and monsters in a multistage free for all.

name: Hopeless
description: After years of burning coal, the heat came. The last survivors ride on a train, followed by the deadly light of the sun.

name: Last Chance in Xollywood
description: You are an extraterrestrial movie director at a low-budget movie studio. In this visual novel/RPG, you'll struggle against capitalism, corruption, and your eccentric coworkers to get the movie done on time and under budget.

name: An Aspie Life Beginnings
description: The Ériu Islands of the Arctic, once famous for their mines, has slipped into disrepair and despair. Those who remain, live an isolated life, fractured by mental health. It’s up to you and your friends to solve a decades-long mystery and face the fears that hide deep underground or inside...

name: Teahouse of Souls
description: Teahouse of Souls is a VR game that grows the seeds of emotions in a fairytale-like space and comforts the soul by making tea with harvested crops.

name: A Million Lightyears Beyond
description: A Starfighter simulation with a dynamic galaxy, Launch into epic missions in a living, dynamic world on your way to building a new home in a galaxy a million lightyears beyond our own.

name: Cyber Sokoban
description: Puzzle game based on sokoban mechanics with futuristic mechanics. Move the futuristic cubes to their respective places, deactivate the leisures and go through the portals to pass the level.

name: TVs: The Awakening
description: Sin descripción

name: Blood Hospital
description: "Blood Hospital" is a FPS Horror adventure game A young man with frequent headache woke up in an abandoned hospital.Here let him have a strange and familiar feeling, locked doors, drugs, dark corridors, the voice in the shadow... A Strange voices always appeared and guided him to do something..

name: Reality Break
description: Rewrite the Universe! Pilot an agile starfighter, upgrade it with randomized loot, and unleash mystical fate energy to alter the fabric of spacetime itself!

name: Die to Survive
description: Gory rail shooter filled with action, explosions, boss battles, weapon upgrades, deamons and zombies ... lot´s of zombies.

name: Clarice Clairvoyage
description: Clarice Clairvoyage is a traditional roguelike adventure where you'll need to navigate the open seas while exploring the islands which offer 'choose your own adventure' style quests.

name: Klaystar
description: Klaystar is a 2D precision platformer, where the player controls Klay, a talented boy with the ability to turn into a bouncy ball, along with his friend Malo. Experience the mysteriously wonderful world of the Pillar, as you follow two boys seeking to join the honorable Vanguard.

name: Selenelion
description: A portal back to August, Friday the 13th, 2021.

name: Doggo Estates
description: Doggo Estates is a multiplayer third-person action game in which a dog has everything he needs to become a real estate mogul: his warm liquid gold! Compete with other neighborhood dogs and pee on as many houses as you can before they do.

name: Polyion
description: A strategy game that hands you the reins of a world that you can populate, build upon and help thrive to reach new eras and milestones.

name: Lovers in the Lunar Labyrinth
description: Play as Oberohm or Altania in this action plaformer roguelike game as they battle through the surreal landscapes of the moon. Explore the labyrinth, and use your powers and your allies to craft powerful weapons and abilities as you break through the cycle that keeps the lovers apart!

name: True Demon
description: The devil has a new stock broker. In this game you'll play as True Demon who sets out to bring the corrupted back to hell. It is an adventure rpg with weapons, armor, dungeons, bosses, and treasure hunting. Come join True Demon in the Hell's trading floor.

name: Ultrasclash V
description: UltrasClash V is a sandbox anime action game, designed and primed to bring you a unique and creative approach to being a hero and unleash all your super powers!

name: Advenclave
description: After the attack on the Great Flying Library, you must unlock the mysteries behind the strange Grimoire you were entrusted. Uncover the secrets of the island you have found yourself on while defending the unique locals from the evils that lurk beneath the surface in this Sandbox Action-RPG.

name: Sosso
description: This is a slightly cute but brainstorming platform jump puzzle-solving game, you need to carefully observe to find the right route, get the key to open the door to the next gate.

name: BlackHill
description: A narrative-driven, single-player adventure like mom used to make, with a charming cast of characters and a touching story of self-discovery

name: Paragrowth
description: Paragrowth is Survival RPG game placed in giant dark forest. Scavenge and explore giant countryside areas overgrown by trees and mysterious living roots. Find hideout to survive nights full of paranormal activities. Hunt mutating prey for ingredients to inject enemies abilities into yourself.

name: Junkienator
description: Step into a janitor's shoes in this thrilling adventure! Clean the offices, solve puzzles and uncover dark secrets about your past. Want to throw those office plants? Do it! Have fun, but beware, something's wrong when you're at home.

name: Mara's Quest
description: Take command of Mara's Mercenaries in this turn-based isometric strategy game. Guide your party across 48 levels of combat, facing enemy soldiers, orcs, undead, and worse. Outfit your party with nearly 400 different pieces of equipment to come out victorious. Create and share your own maps.

name: Lightspeed Dating
description: A cyberpunk social deduction game in which players voices are made unidentifiable. Perfectly copy your friends speech patterns, mannerisms and opinions to win in this intense experimental party game. Find out how well you really know your friends!

name: Hyperspace Harvest
description: The whale is sick, dear child. Grow crops on its skin. Fight cells in its flesh. This is your purpose in this world. For the whale is god and it is sick and you are the remedy.​

name: Shufflepoker
description: Shufflepoker is a revisited poker game, turned into a duel where you have to play tactics and tricks so that your challenger’s life points reach 0 before yours. Take a seat, sustain yourself and impose your style in this tavern full of opponents who are looking for fame.

name: Ion Stormfire
description: Fast paced shoot em up played across 12 levels. Point your ship in any direction, deciding constantly between extra firepower (firing in any 2 directions) and movement. Or deploy the directional shield to block bullets from a single direction, point your ship and dodge simultaneously.

name: Necrowave
description: Necrowave is a game about the emotional life of a zombie stuck in a microwave. It's a 2D platformer with critical based combat where each different enemy feels like a puzzle you need to solve instead of relying on brute hack & slash tactics.

name: No Way Out
description: No Way Out is a single-player psychological horror. Paranormal activity is on the rise and it’s up to you to get rid of it and get the hell out of the house.

name: Delusional
description: When Kevin, the burglar, gets lost in the woods, he comes across an old abandoned mansion nearby. Later on, he'd decided to rob this mansion. However, he later discovers that the mansion he is attempting to rob is owned by an ex-doctor who is now known as a wanted Psychopathic Murderer.

name: Third Power
description: Third Power is a unique puzzle adventure where players alternate between forms with distinct abilities in order to progress through a mysterious tomb. Avoid traps, crush monsters, solve puzzles, and uncover the secrets of an enigmatic curse as you advance toward discovering your third power.

name: Autogame Deluxe
description: A one button party game where you battle to win rounds by being the last car driving on increasingly chaotic crossroads!

name: Tobin's Tale
description: Tobin's Tale! It's a game. About words. And throwing them. At adventures. It's the point & throw adventure game!

name: Freenergy
description: Develop your robot, combine abilities. Fight in turn-based mode, effectively distributing energy. Overcome all difficulties and gain freedom.

name: Holodeck Arena
description: Compete for supremacy in this fast-paced cyberspace-RTS with exotic units and supply chains of your own making.

name: Olgob the Bold
description: Traverse the Mutating castle to hunt down the Bear Lords and free the orcs. A Metroidvania Soulslike RPG where the world evolves as you progress through the story. As the world evolves so can you.

name: Fastest Fantasy Life Simulator
description: Welcome to the Fastest Fantasy Life Simulator! Get up to four friends and together you prepare for your fantasy life! Meet pesky lords, humorous dragons and friendly goblins. Every decision you make will determine the fate of your life. How will you decide? What does the future hold for you?

name: Hold On
description: Beat your enemy and building your own level.

name: Creepy Tale 3: Ingrid Penance
description: As punishment for her transgressions, Ingrid is sent to hell. As she struggles through the darkness that hungers to consume her heart, she makes her way toward redemption. Her fate is in your hands.

name: Oden
description: Shape your destiny in the world of Oden, immersed in Sardinian Folklore. Use the powers of time to defeat your enemies in fast-paced and deadly combat, explore a lost world and uncover ancient stories from Oden's past. Challenge the will of the Tower of Heresy.

name: Akari: The Five Eyed Fox
description: Play as Akari, a magical fox imbued with the power of light in this fast paced Metroidvania. Slash and Dash your way through an army of darkness and explore diverse, beautiful worlds.

name: Night of Disturbance
description: This game is a short Horror experience, which you as the player will explore and travel through the linear story. This game will challenge you to face your fears and travel through creepy corridors and dark forests. Will you find the secrets lurking in the darkness?

name: AirRaid
description: A remake of a classic 90's DOS action arcade shooter with modern, fully destructible enemies. 10 waves of progressively increasing insanity.

name: Go Home Annie
description: A twisted first person horror adventure. As an employee of the SCP Replication Division you are tasked with testing artificially developed paranormal events. Solve puzzles, converse with anomalous entities and explore multiple paths to untangle the secrets behind the Replication Division.

name: Polyspell
description: Polyspell is a survival RPG based in a fantasy land where you manage a base that you build against titans. Place traps, create spells, craft weapons, fight off the titans and become stronger to prove your worthy of becoming a wizard

name: Brunch Rush
description: Brunch Rush is a Gameboy inspired RPG where you play as Claire, a young waitress at Lily's Diner, as she tries to make some money over the summer. Things don't go as planned.

name: Engines of Destruction
description: Currently in development; EOD is a large-scale, tactical, combined-arms, PvP, FPS, featuring mechs and an emphasis on a wide variety of game modes, from realistic to casual. This game will feature full support for community servers and mods.

name: Sinus
description: Shoot, loot, hack, level up, die, upgrade. SINUS is a futuristic action-platformer RPG, with metroidvania and roguelike elements. Synergize skills, weapons and items. Control powerful turrets, enemies or even cheat death. Explore generated maps to complete missions and stop SINUS, humanity's savior.

name: A Most Extraordinary Gnome
description: As life in the forest becomes harder each year, it's up to one small gnome to keep danger at bay. You have to protect the forest, keep the animals safe and drive away the incoming darkness in this gorgeous, hand crafted paper cut-out world.

name: Ruuuuuun
description: Ruuuuuun - The game is a puzzle. Move the pawns in the right sequence to move to the next level.

name: Police Stories: The Academy
description: Welcome, trainee! Use tactics and special equipment to become a true cop in the free version of Police Stories: The Academy. Neutralize criminals, search for clues and find a "rat" in the police station alone or in co-op with a partner.

name: Mist
description: Train skills, fight monsters, make friends, and explore the vast Mist universe. Play 6 distinct and different classes, each with their own set of abilities, strengths, and weaknesses.

name: The One Penny Adventure
description: Cross Aremica with only one penny and deliver the penny to mrBest. You have one penny and have to trade it for bigger and better items until you sell your last item and have enough money to buy a plane ticket to the next city, You have to cross 5 cities in order to deliver mrBest the penny.

name: Hi Eggplant!
description: It's an original farming experience game, with a different experience from most of the farming games. You can harvest high-quality eggplants through reasonable physical distribution, careful observation and accumulated experience. I hope you can feel the fun of actual planting.

name: Dark Blue Warriorr
description: A portal from Deep Blue appeared, and the protagonist of the warrior decided to walk into the portal to find out. Come on, warrior.

name: Infinity Project: Patterns
description: Strange powers and void-like beings threaten the struggling normalcy of the Nameless City, a hopeful region at the end of the world that clings to a past life.

name: Dan the Inmortal
description: Dan wants to reach the top to drink the fountain of mortality, will he be able to reach his goal?

name: Ashen Will
description: Trapped, and with enemies closing in, your only chance of survival is to rely on the simple camera you hold. Ashen Will is an atmospheric maze-based horror game, where your options are preciously low. No one is coming to help. No one is coming to save you. Survive.

name: Shutter Labs
description: Work your way through 25 intricate puzzles designed to subvert your expectations using your trusty Shutter Cube as leverage to reach higher platforms... But keep in mind that each throw, is a dice roll, potentially causing you to swap places with your cube or you know, spontaneously combust!

name: Morodashi Sumo
description: Do you know the traditional Japanese national sport "Morodashi Sumo"? You can use any hand, so let's remove the opponent's "Mawashi". If you make the opponent "Morodashi", you win.

name: Froggy's Farm & Friends
description: Help a friendly frog named Phroge as they farm, craft, and explore. Plant and grow crops for potion crafting, discover their unique magical qualities, and explore to uncover new friends!

name: Animalistic
description: Animalistic is a fast-paced, ultraviolent, and stylish indie FPS game where you brutally clear room after room of creepy humanoid animals.

name: Opalescence
description: The colorful top-down shooter/bullet-hell.

name: Apollo's Adventure
description: Step into the shoes of Apollo and try to find the Sage of Wisdom as you explore many levels and face multiple puzzles.

name: Foster: Ghost Child
description: Foster: Ghost Child provides an atmospheric horror that incorporates East Asian elements rarely used in games. The game makes use of Chinese traditional elements to convey a distinct and frightful storyline that incorporates Taoism, Buddhism, and Chinese mythology.

name: Wilderness Game Stalker VR: North America
description: Stalk and hunt North America’s most iconic game species in virtual reality through woodland, prairie, and lakeside vistas. Line up the perfect shot on a trophy buck, and experience the fear of becoming the hunted as dangerous predators turn the tables on unwary hunters.

name: Hot and Lovely 5
description: A very interesting puzzle game. You need to remember the different pictures by flipping the cards, and find the same pictures to eliminate.

name: My Dad Left Me
description: Welcome to My Dad Left Me, a sequel to Scuffy Game that no one on Earth asked for.

name: Miko no Kanata: Curious Tales from Oguni Shrine - Cycles
description: All the heroines are miko! Fighting miko! Working miko! Moe miko! A girl's love that pierces through time. A tragic fate imposed upon these fighting shrine maidens. And the darkness who seek to rampage through the world of night... With those strong feelings, will Yuuya and Akiha be together?!

name: The Past Rhapsody
description: A short, about an hour long Eastern old-schhool RPG about forbidden lands and broken friendships. Somewhat amusing, somewhat dark, It's about a hero's journey to understand himself and his life long frienemy.

name: House of Witches
description: House of Witches is a visual novel exclusively for adults! In this game you will find an exciting story about the life of two lesbian witches who love sex very much. The game is filled with scenes of sex, humor and romance.

name: NetaJump
description: NetaJump is a indie casual game where you grasp the chance to jump higher, unlock skins, or follow the hints in the skin descriptions to unlock them.

name: Breeze
description: Breeze, a point&click PC game with heart-warming story, lovely art style, and healing experience.

name: Tinheung & Sayuri
description: Tinheung & Sayuri is a game of visual novel. This is a short Yuri story across age, nationality and gender.

name: World Serpent
description: Take control of giant snake monster consuming everything in its way! Nowhere is safe from you on this planet! Not even in space.

name: Escape: Site-13
description: Escape is a platform-adventure game of new weird style. You will be in an uncontrollable research institution, and witness the site being disintegrated by Data Elimination. Seek a gleam of light desperately in the erosion of the darkness.

name: Rogue: Genesia
description: Walk upon a new world and slay foes endangering it. Rogue : Genesia is a rogue-lite deck building game, where you fight relentless hordes consisting of hundreds and thousands of monsters, carve your path through their ranks, defeat the boss and save one of the many worlds.

name: 69 Penny Hot
description: 69 Penny Hot - is a game that contains novel and memory puzzle elements. You decided to drink a cup of hot coffee and met the pretty barista Lady Penny.

name: My Bunny Girl
description: One day a lonely guy finds an amulet and puts it on his pet. His rabbit is transformed into a beautiful girl. He is embarrassed and does not even know what to say, but for the beauty girl he is not a stranger, because he is her master!

name: Underway
description: When Leo gets a request from his boss to come in to work at an unusual time, he's confused, but goes in anyway. When he gets there, his boss tells him to come up to his office. But when Leo attempts to go up, he faces some obstacles... Find your way to the fifth floor and figure out what's going on!

name: New Tanks
description: New top-down shooter about tanks.

name: The Fighters Online
description: 90s style Indie fighting game

name: Clashbowl
description: Have fun & enjoy the best VR bowling atmosphere & graphics! Exactly like in real life right from your own comfort And without leaving your house!

name: Stories School
description: Meet a very strange school that can not only teach you, but also entertain and scare you! Meet students and also teachers who are "Glad to see you".

name: Grassland Defender Keita
description: It's a mix of shooting and running, shooting enemies with bows and arrows, saving animals with parachutes, and dodging cacti and crocodiles by jumping.

name: Pip
description: Pip is a cute puzzle game with pipes. Enjoy a relaxing time connecting pipes.

name: Angel's Awakening
description: Angel's Awakening is an Interactive Erotic Story about the amazing sexual awakening of a shy, reserved young librarian in the 1940s. In classic NOIR style, follow Angel's journey as she transforms from a repressed young woman into an uninhibited, lustful goddess with an insatiable appetite for sex.

name: Angy
description: It's survival of the fittest lemming in this golf-like battle with epic abilities, deadly traps, and many maps! You can complete solo-challenges or play against your friends online or locally!

name: Animal Zone
description: Animal zone is a fast and furious one-shot one-kill 2D shooter game. Make headshots, tear your opponents to pieces, and stay alive to take your place in the food chain! Face off against your friends and other players in this brutal animal world.

name: Animperium
description: Animperium is a turn-based strategy tabletop game! Fight with other players for resources to expand your army and buildings to destroy the enemy's main base! Explore the underground to gather resources in the later game and surprise the enemy from below!

name: Anitons
description: Anitons is an vast world monster collection RPG featuring base building, farming and real time combat. Explore vast world and tame, look after and evolve creatures that you will catch.

name: Augury
description: A fantasy RTS game set in a massive procedurally generated world. Build, explore, and survive while trying to uncover the dark secrets of these forgotten lands.

name: Attacker-chan!
description: Attacker-chan! is a 2.5D short, roguelike action game with cute animations. Complete your missions by subduing out-of-control mechs.

name: Audioclash: Battle of the Bands
description: Sin descripción

name: A Town Called Happenstance
description: Save the programmer, save the world! Help freelance detective Carter Montague by pointing & clicking (or rather pointing & dragging) to track down a missing developer and stop an evil corporation from holding the entire world hostage!

name: Bakeborough
description: In Bakeborough, a Bakery RPG, you can take out your eye to see less.

name: Balam: Bounce Hell
description: Balam: Bounce Hell is a non-shooting bullet hell set in Pre-Columbian America. You won't be able to directly attack the enemies you find in your path. It will only be possible to finish off your opponents by rebounding their own attacks. That is why, in Balam, defense is always the best attack.

name: Ballistic Zen
description: Skate. Strafe. Wallrun. Master a unique movement system based on old-school air-strafing, updated for the modern age. Use your hoverblades to find hard to reach collectables and beat time trials in an open world. Feel the Ballistic Zen.

name: Baradroid: A Gay Visual Novel
