description: A choice-driven, high-tech, gay visual novel with elements of dating-sim! Choose your baradroid, Live with him, and... Can you teach a robot the meaning of human love?

name: Bananner Nababber
description: It's a nice sunny day in Neo-Tartaria and ruthless killer Harry Pippels and his pretend friend Humpty-Ho are guzzling down some sprutzels and racking up a debt at the bar. Their life of luxury is soon interrupted however when the Elder Demon's diabolical crypto schemes threaten the lands.

name: Banner of Blood
description: This medieval fantasy base-building game allows you to lead your warriors to traverse randomly generated battlefields. Reinforce the capital against the orcs' invasion.

name: Beasts of Merit
description: In this non-linear dystopian adventure, your goal is to hunt down dissidents standing in the way of a brighter future. Interrogate your fellow citizens, gain evidence of dissent, reveal their motives, and decide their fates. Support the system or use your position to dismantle it, brick by brick.

name: Beasts Rampage
description: Forge your path through the unknown kingdom. Explore a variety of landscapes and caverns infested with vast monsters and creatures. Battle your way through and explore the kingdom in this 2.5D Style shooter-platform-fighting game.

name: Bear the Terrain
description: Metroidvania style reverse bridge builder game. Build vehicles, pick up hitchhikers and escape the deadly island. Finished the story? Play against frinds in a local PvP mode.

name: Beast Fists
description: Are you ready to face your fears and fight for your freedom? Unleash your inner Beast and take it back!!!

name: Beaver Clicker
description: Beaver Clicker is an idle game where you collects logs, then using these logs, you can acquire all sorts of sources for these logs, like convincing squirrels, sponsoring school field-trips, or even taming the fungi found in nature itself to help you in your wood collecting journey.

name: Binary.
description: Binary. is a cybernetic stylish action game where you fight viruses with big swords and guns. You are a freelance cracker who must dive into the net to fight the defenses and take control of the net. Use stylish swordplay and gunfire to create combos and fight off viruses in spectacular fashion.

name: Bioframe: Outpost
description: Bioframe Outpost is a 2d sci-fi action adventure game, dedicated to exploration, experimentation, emergent gameplay, and narrative. Its unique approach to non-linear exploration and action gameplay offers a fresh take on Metroidvania gameplay.

name: BicycleSim
description: Buy, Assemble and Ride a bicycle. Choose from a large number of Bicycle variants. Can ride the pre-built bicycles in a wide number of exotic environments and locations !!

name: Bicycle Mechanic Simulator
description: Run your bicycle workshop and repair bicycles by your own hand. Tighten the screws, adjust the chain, and then do some personalized printing. It's not just your sweat that makes you a bicycle repair master, but your attention to detail and skills.

name: Water Fall
description: Immersive side-scroller in a world where water has become scarce

name: What the Fortress!?
description: A Tower Defense game where you carve the path for your enemies and you form the terrain. Unlock 20+ Towers, fight against 30 types of enemies and choose from 5 different ground tiles.

name: Warped Times
description: Born in a dystopian world, you will discover the secrets of the magic stone which provides life and death to whole civilizations. Experience the fight between good and evil, as well as the blending of time and space itself. And in the end, maybe you will save more than one civilization!

name: Warplane Quest
description: Warplane Quest tells the story of a young pilot destined to become a legendary flying ace. The game features intense dogfights, varied missions, beautiful landscapes and procedurally generated battlefields.

name: Warrior Souls
description: Warrior Souls is a multiplayer and singelplayer medieval-fantasy game. Play with your friends or fight with other players in brutal battles. You can choose different Warriors from knights to samurais or Vikings. You will experience 1vs1, a great story, castle fights, and more.

name: Story Walker
description: "Story Walker" is a leisure collection puzzle solving Chinese game. The game tells the story of the new book wizard entering the book world to collect elves.Players need to control the hostess to explore in the scene, and have a small journey with the game characters.

name: Garden Guardian
description: Take control of master gardener Snippy Shrubs and keep your garden safe at all costs! A new take on classic LCD games, rethought through a modern lens! Complete objectives through 18 Trial levels, or hop into the four Endless levels to show that you can garden with the best of them!

name: Life after Death
description: Do you remember the scares that chased you in childhood? How did your limbs shake with fear, take your breath away, and you couldn't do anything about it? I invite you to live it all over again!

name: Blastonier
description: A 2D physics-based puzzle game inspired by old flash games and arcade tasking you with shooting a ball into a cube.

name: Fly Fly Tuk Tuk
description: Have you ever thought about what it's like to see a tuk tuk flying?

name: Alaris
description:
A global crisis that only continues to escalate. A dangerous run-in with a shadowy stranger. And a mysterious word that won't stop gnawing at you. How does everything tie together? And what role could you possibly play in all of this?

Enter a world of magic—of Fae and Dragon.

name: The Final Answer
description: A survival horror trivia game. Survive traps and twisted games by answering trivia questions. Incorrect answers lead to death.

name: Stereo Boy
description: A chill, innovative sci-fi adventure where you explore two isometric worlds at the same time. Teleport between worlds to navigate impossible terrain and solve mind-bending puzzles. Along the way, you'll fend off hostile creatures and uncover the story of a lost civilization.

name: Sissa's Path
description: Sissa's Path is a sokoban game where you play as the kitten Sissa! You will have the opportunity to get to know one of the curious hobbies of Sissa's: Playing with her toys! Help Sissa move her toys to the corrrect spot in this fun but challenging game. Can you help Sissa organize her toys?

name: LoFi Hotel
description: This is a cozy game that mixes management with world map exploration. Gather gems to unlock rooms and hotel improvements. Explore levels in a sky world to collect the cutest guests and musicians in the islands. Your songs will change depending of which musicians you collected. No rush! Just chill!

name: Maze Ablaze
description: Maze Ablaze is a fast-paced strategy game where you move the walls of a maze to defend an explosive barrel from an oncoming flame! Move fast and think faster as you work with limited resources to survive as long as possible.

name: Neon Circle
description: Rotate, think, wait, jump and rotate the screen.

name: Miners and Machines
description: Become a gold mine owner! Find gold in the ground, dig for it, and deliver it to the gold washing plant machine! Build your mining plant and manage machines which take a lot of fuel… Buy new lands and upgrades for your equipment! It’s a real gold fever!

name: Bloodwatch
description: Bloodwatch is a short horror game about surviving at all cost on the island when the maniacs are trying to find and kill you. Explore, finding weapons, items, find the leader and kill him.

name: Tribe War
description: It is a strategic card game (SCG) that combines the genre of card games, chess, and chess. Create an original deck and use your card to target your opponent's base Stores, card packs, and new species will be added in the future.

name: War of Bellrook
description: Go forth on a text-based, choose your own adventure where you can choose your role and embark on adventure as various different people who tread different paths.

name: Monkey Milk
description: You're monkey must collect fruit to process into delicious beverages while avoiding not-so-friendly creatures that live alongside the groves of fruit in this level based, top down game.

name: Embodiment
description: In this 2D puzzle platformer, take control of a blob with the ability to take control and embody skeletons. Use their abilities to swim, climb, and fly through the facility.

name: Code Rivals
description: Code Rivals is a free-to-play, autonomous-robot programming and combat game. Learn the basics in the campaign tutorial or challenge your friends in online combat arenas, in different multiplayer modes.

name: Fossil Finder
description: You are a young promising scientist who went to the excavations of ancient lands. Find all the artifacts of antiquity, precious stones and remains of past civilizations!

name: Deneb: Across the Stars
description: “Deneb: Across the Stars” is a mouse only, top-down, hardcore-platformer. Astronaut Vega crosses the stars to find her lost colleague Altair and save the dogs. Move carefully. A single mistake can lead to an endless fall.

name: Sokobalien
description: Do you have what it takes to build the biggest space farm in the galaxy? Help the alien reach this goal in this classic Sokoban puzzle style game! Push cows, sheep, pigs and chicken so that the correct UFO beams can abduct them. (Also, as a side-quest, collect all the hats you can!)

name: Mothercore
description: A tower defense game with weird and wacky towers and enemies. Play in the two modes, Story mode and Arcade mode. And follow a weird story about an organization and last power source humans have.

name: Everything Has Arms
description: High-five a cannon, chase a flowerpot or escape the vicious hunters in Everything has Arms, a fast-paced hide and seek VR game. Room-Scale VR highly recommended.

name: Lymph City Blues
description: Take on the role of a detective immune cell named Dan Dendrick in this neo-noir narrative. Track down and uncover the murderer of the mayor of Lymph City using your sleuthing prowess and bring justice back to Lymph City...for no one is immune to justice.

name: Slaughter Horse 2
description: Use deduction, murder and trust your luck to eliminate the town council and rule over the helpless cartoon horses in a twisted strategy RPG.

name: Fire All Humans
description: Fire all the humans in splatastic fun and solve the puzzles. With hilarious explosions, addictive physics based shooting of your humans to reach the end goals!

name: The Dam Nation
description: The Dam Nation is a roguelike FPS where you will need to consider which enemies you can fight and which can be evaded. You can use tools to break your enemies’ lines of communication, lure them into traps, or when the situation calls for it - shoot them in the face with a rocket.

name: Rallyallyally
description: Rallyallyally is a multiplayer, last-man-standing racing game. Each round one player makes a new track that the others must follow. Slow players are eliminated until only one remains. It's fun, bold and exciting.

name: Dash Shooters
description: Dash Shooters is a multiplayer, fast paced racing game, where the main movement mechanic is dashing! You can race through a randomly generated map, gather powerups, fight your friends, go through objectives, shoot crystals, and much more! Play with up to six of your friends for endless fun!

name: Voxrush
description: Voxrush is a time survival FPS game with a full destructible voxel environment. Kill monsters, take points, upgrade stats and weapons, use skills and find a better way to survive as long as possible to become the best!

name: Descentium
description: Whilst researching the mysterious new element Descentium, A remote facility in Southeast Asia has gone radio silent. Alina, an elite operative who works for Descent Laboratories has been sent to investigate. Will Alina discover the secrets of the temple or fall into madness?

name: Radiant Cell
description: What do you do when you're locked inside a video game with a crazed AI and some guns? You F*CKING run and kill...That's what you do! in the world of radiant cell, get ready to defend yourself as you wall run, shoot, slow down time, and of course grapple.

name: Bravery
description: In Bravery, the player must defend his brewery by building crossbow, automatic crossbow, and flamethrower towers, which can be augmented with minion pawns. Pawns can be equipped with hammers and shields if improvements are purchased for their brewery.

name: Anomalia
description: You must survive this horror and puzzle game, Robots were created to aid in technological advances, but here they are getting more and more terrible, explore the place and delve deeper into the terror.

name: Tracing Decay
description: Tracing Decay is a dark dystopian simulation, that revisits impactful art that revolves around themes of decay, memory loss and recollection. The experience allows the player to explore the environment freely in search for several galleries within the ruins.

name: Para-Lax
description: Para-Lax is a 2D platformer in which you play as a hero named Lax and help a farmer get back his stolen dirt! Wander through a beautiful Pixel-World, avoid the traps and kill as much goblins as you can.

name: Age of Undead
description: Age of Undead is a multi-genre game (turn-based, RTS, FPS) that allows you to face the frightful Zombie Apocalypse with 3 unique factions: the Army, the Infected, and the Survivors. Make strategic choices in the Campaign, then go into battle and fight to survive!

name: Radii
description: Radii is a challenging platformer. Traverse an abandoned compound with limited movement capabilities, managing energy and momentum.

name: Zombie Apocalypse: The Last Defense
description: Create your own strategies, tactics and manage your resources in this survival tower defense game. Buy weapons, vehicles, explosives, soldiers, turrets and battle against huge waves of zombies. Can you survive for 25 days?

name: Mutant Meltdown
description: Mutant Meltdown is a fast-paced turn-based with roguelike elements in which you have a group of survivors in the aftermath of an apocalypse. The ultimate goal is to survive the mutants.

name: Kraino Origins
description: Ghouls, ghost & plenty of hidden wall meat. In Kraino Origns you'll explore 8 levels of unadulterated retro platformer action! With ghoulish enemies, powerful weapons, hidden secrets, and a boss ready to wipe the floor with you!

name: War Dots
description: Fast paced tug-of-war auto-battler. Unleash hordes of soldiers and wreak havoc upon your enemies!

name: Dodge Mania
description: In Dodge Mania you will go through different levels where you will control character and you have to dodge falling objects. New level - new custom objects!!

name: The Bad Kids
description: As an adaptation of the popular suspecse TV series, Cat's Cradle, this game combines investigation, solving puzzles and reasoning with original stories, which can build a more Immersive experience. Game will build new stories based on original setting and focus on the inner world of the character.

name: Droid Warfare
description: An exoplanet named Pumara is a highly resourceful world & is civilized by cybernetic androids. An army of Alien- based Androids launches an international invasion in attempt to take control of the planet. The citizens of Pumara formed an alliance to fight the alien forces & to protect their planet.

name: Truck Simulator in City
description: Truck Simulation game in which we combine Arcade and Simulation gameplay. Pick up your cargo and deliver it to the destination. If you want to pamper yourself, access Stunt Trails or Parking mods.

name: Pencil Case TD
description: Pencil Case TD is a tower defense game with pencil cases and stationery as the theme. Players need to use different stationery to guard their scores to get promoted.

name: Japanese TeTris
description: Japanese TeTris is Tetris like you've never seen before - incredibly addictive in stylistic graphics too!

name: Tactic Legends
description: Tactic Legends is a free-to-play, player-vs-player turn-based strategy game for mobile, inspired by games such as Final Fantasy Tactics and Tactics Ogre. Characters and environmental objects are 2D, while the game maps are in a 3D rotatable space.

name: Note of Janus
description: The ordinary mansion where the Marquis of Ethan is living... and a terrible incident happens there. Get to the bottom of the case and uncover the secrets hidden in the mansion!

name: Matcha
description: Matcha is a simple puzzle game, built around the beautiful Korean writing system, Hangul.

name: Snow War
description: In the cold of an arctic apocalypse the human race is stuck in the 80’s and the only thing left to do is sling snowballs at your friends and foes!

name: Blight
description: Five strangers from different backgrounds must work together to save the world in a squad based tactical action game dripping with '80s horror charm.

name: Thunder Helix
description: Pilot deadly helicopter gunships, battle enemy forces and complete dangerous missions within a thrilling desert warzone!

name: Idle Baker Boss
description: Grow your bakery franchise and manage bakeries in this cute idle tycoon game

name: Alien Decimation
description: Destroy waves of UFOs in a arcade style space shooter with an array of powerful weaponry.

name: Motel Simulator
description: An abandoned motel across from the gas station. Renovate and furnish it, rent rooms and expand. Pick your patrons wisely - just handing them their room key and getting their cash is just where the adventure with your guests starts…

name: Object Wars
description: The war is small, in Object Wars fights the other players with weapons like a toothpick launcher, the last one alive wins the game.

name: Tikus Tales
description: Tikus Tales is a single-player/2-player split-screen couch co-op 3D action platformer game about a mouse and a squirrel that are thrust into the role of recovering a stolen relic. The game is a mixture of platforming, combat and puzzle solving, with boss fights and collectibles to be found.

name: Seasons of the Sorcerer
description: Seasons of the Sorcerer is a top-down action game set to Antonio Vivaldi's "Four Seasons.” Use a diverse set of spells to incinerate, bash, transform, and control your foes on a year long journey across early Renaissance Italy.

name: The Ghost and the Golem
description: Confront mystic perils and revelations, pogroms, & your own wild heart, in a Jewish historical fantasy of bandits, betrothals, klezmers, and kabbalists!

name: Celestial Tear: Lost World
description: Explore an eerie planet marooned in a dark dimension known as the void. Command a dysfunctional trio of soldiers in fast-paced tactical combat with otherworldly creatures. Scavenge for supplies and build a camp to survive the harsh environment on this Lost World!

name: Ghost Puncher
description: This is a beat'em up with influences from Guardian Heroes and Little Fighters 2, 3D hand-drawn environments, with anime-style characters and music composed exclusively for the game.

name: The Explorator
description: Explore mysterious counter-zones and brave dangers to discover priceless treasures buried beneath the ruins of Atlantis.

name: After Corruption
description: A retro survival horror game where you dive into fragmented procedural levels to try and save the world from the corruption that destroyed it

name: Our Hero! Last
description: Start the last Our Hero! adventure which ends the trilogy: a new hero joins the party to help Ourhero, Tay and Fury to fight in the final epic battle!

name: King of Conquerors
description: Your journey from adventurer to king will begin here!

name: Server Owner Tycoon
description: Server Owner Tycoon has you step into the shoes of a game server owner to build your own online empire. Manage your staff members, catch the latest trends, keep users satisfied, research new features, and administer your server. Do you have what it takes to become the best server owner?

name: SSS222: HyperSpace
description: A fast-paced addicting space shooter with an inspiration taken from many modern games. A project I have been passionately working solo for the past 2 years!

name: Yusetsu
description: Snow melting bar, melt the ice in your heart. This is a warm love game, where you can enjoy a real Japanese bar love experience.

name: Ever Seen A Cat? 3
description: A relaxing hidden object game. Find yet more cats in several new fairy tale themed environments! Every play through is different!

name: Lum: Hide from Nightmares
description: Lum is a stealth and puzzle game where you control a soul and its companion dog. Hide and run from the nightmare creatures of this dreadful place while solving puzzles. Escape from the limbo to find peace in this short adventure!

name: Ashen Knights: One Passage
description: Two heroes, two different genres: souls-like & hack’n’slash. They switch places and trigger a wild emotional storm making sure you never get bored of playing. Assay your strength and stamina as a defender of the Abyss-devoured world. Be merciless yet cautious in Ashen Knights: One Passage.

name: HeistGeist
description: A story-driven RPG set in a cyberpunk version of Central Europe. Play as Alexandra, doublecrossed street-smart thief on the run after a job gone bad. Put together a team of specialists, execute highly elaborate heists, fight in card-based battles and hack into the most secure corporate systems.

name: Mass Harvest
description: Mass Harvest is the first Unreal Engine 5 game. Survive the alien parasite pandemic! They have destroyed our moon and harvested all our resources and guess what? We are the main resource of this planet so get ready before they get to you!

name: Pixel Gangsters
description: Run your gang of mobsters and conquer the city in this indie mafia tycoon game.

name: Pirate's Den Renovator
description: Help a devastated harbor bay get back on its feet just after being attacked and burned down. Rebuild, renovate and expand your new stationary business. Attract as many customers as possible, take care of the supply chain and micromanage workshops to become the greatest retired pirate ever!

name: Rapid Retort
description: Test your speed, aim, and awareness in Rapid Retort as you tackle a series of progressively more complex shooting trials.

name: Pentacore
description: Pentacore is a metroidvania with a focus on platforming and exploration. Run, shoot, climb, and blast your way through a massive world. All in order to find five keys and leave your prison of a planet.

name: Spirit Eyes
description: Spirit Eyes is a horror game in which, as an experienced exorcist, you take a contract to an abandoned house in Wyoming. Player must discover the type of ghost and try to get rid of it. As you try to communicate with the spirit, you will have to make choices that will affect the course of the game.

name: Mana Valley
description: A strange dark force has moved over mana valley turning once friendly creatures into vicious adversaries. As a novice witch, you must hone your skills in magic to find and defeat the evil that is plaguing your home.

name: MouseWars
description: MouseWars is a real time multiplayer cursor war game. The cursors have to fight until only one remains.

name: Cyberhunk
description: Retro FPS wave shooter with stackable powerups and upgradeable weapons.

name: Hooking Season
description: Hooking Season is a chaotic couch competitive new take on the twin stick shooter gameplay, up to four players. Use your hook for maneuvering around the levels, and grabbing your opponents. The more you eat the fatter you get and in this world the fatter the better.

name: Pando Engines
description: Sin descripción

name: HyperGlide
description: Hypergliders is an intense wingsuit flying game featuring infinite procedural levels and trick combos. You can glide to relax or you can glide for a spot on the leaderboard, it's your choice.

name: Lost Melody
description: Sin descripción

name: Call to Arms: Gates of Hell - Ostfront
description:
Independently developed by Barbedwire studios, published by Digitalmindsoft.
GoH is an RTS/ RTT that portrays WW2.
It offers a choice of instantly switchable top- down, third person and first person (for vehicles). SP, PvE, PvP. Dynamic campaigns are available for singleplayer and in co-op.

name: Circuit Defender
description: Circuit Defender is a tower defence game, where you need to protect your electrical components from various forms of ESD, lightning strikes and overvoltages. Come on in, and defend your components!

name: SHPR
description: Sin descripción

name: Interference: Dead Air
description: All hell's breaking loose in a mysterious research facility and the only person who can save the day is the night shift security guard in the booth outside. Remotely control systems, guide scientists to safety or just… goof off? You’re not in danger. Yet.

name: Sub Chase Online
description: Sin descripción

name: Genimas: Life Reborn
description: you are Drassil, a demigod raised and trained by Freyja far from civilization, your destiny is to defeat the evil entity known as Ragnarok and to achieve it, you will have to evolve genetically traveling through the 9 Nordic worlds.

name: Deepfield
description: Deepfield is a sandbox RTS set in the tiny world of microbiology. Deepfield's microverse is alive and contains many biomes, each with their own mix of environmental mechanics and unique enemy types. Find and exploit resources, multiply in number and expand your territory to fend off extinction.

name: Dragon Mine
description: Go through the numerous mazes and try to get to the cave full of gold waiting at the end, but remember - the journey won't be easy. Think fast and move precisely to get to the exit - any delay may result in the escape portal to be covered with mysterious water, blocking your way out.

name: HopeLand
description: Sin descripción

name: Metal Shock Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Starcom: Unknown Space
description: Starcom: Unknown Space is an action RPG of space exploration and adventure. Build your own starship while discovering an epic story in a universe of strange mysteries, alien factions and uncharted worlds.

name: Ex0 Escape
description: Ex0 Escape is a third-person looter shooter bullet hell. Evade lasers, loot defeated enemies, and grapple your way out of the facility. Build up your Ex0 with modules, become a threat to humanity, and find greater and greater weapons to become an unstoppable force!

name: The Fate of Baldr
description: Join the Vikings in an epic tower defense adventure! Defend your ship against mythical bosses while mining resources and upgrading skills. Battle solo or team up with friends in online co-op for a journey of strategy, conquest, and victory.

name: Gangstar New York
description: Welcome to the Big Apple, a huge free-to-play social sandbox ripe for the taking. Race, shoot, steal, and jetpack your way to the top of the underworld in a near-future New York. Claim the Kingpin title, change the game for everyone and reap the rewards. Your city, your rules.

name: Crawl Tactics
description: Sin descripción

name: Aliens After Ava
description: You are Ava, a survivor out in the wild in the midst of an alien invasion. Fight back as you dodge, jump, roll, and use advanced technology to navigate your escape across terrain and extraterrestrial foes!

name: Master of Earth
description: A voice from beyond awakens the vast potential within you. As you master these unearthed powers, you will raise the secrets hidden in a temple once thought destroyed.

name: SparkMutts
description: Explore a Massive procedurally generated Steampunk world full of smart Dogs. Meet Villagers, Brave dangers in procedural Dungeons, Buy or build your home, Craft Innovative Gadgets and explore vast biomes with fantastical mechanical Beasts on this Brass Filled Adventure.

name: Space Trash Scavenger
description: Grab your jetpack and explore procedural asteroid fields, derelict spaceships and abandoned outposts. Build your Space Rig to process scavenged trash. Craft, trade and fight your way to success in this interstellar, open-world sandbox.

name: Zero World
description: Gather resources, craft items, kill others, raid houses, but don't get raided yourself

name: Bring Death
description: Revenge your loved ones - No matter what it takes, and no matter how much suffering you have to inflict!

name: Raccoon Roller
description: A sidescrolling physics platformer that challenges your creative thinking and mechanical skill. Using rockets and grapples find the fastest way through levels to climb ranks on the leaderboard.

name: Cognition Method
description: Cognition Method is a story-driven, first-person puzzle game inspired by Space Odyssey 2001 and Solaris. Discover an innovative mechanics of altering gravity and dive into the surreal setting. Find your way within a mysterious artifact and unveal a non-ordinary story.

name: Heated
description: HEATED combines RTS elements with FPS elements in a spin on the FPS genre. Purchase mining rigs to get as much gold as possible, while hacking your opponents to hinder their mining. Then, there's the "action phase," where teams use gold to purchase equipment to take down their opponent.

name: Wings VR
description: Sin descripción

name: Oldowan
description: Oldowan is a first-person casual survival sandbox game that is focused on very early humanity and how it developed. The crafting is all based on real practices, but the survival aspects are relaxed. Play solo or with 1-3 friends.

name: Smushi Come Home
description: Play as a tiny lil' mushroom who's lost in the forest and can't find its way home. Explore unique areas freely at your own pace, chat with friendly inhabitants, and take on different adventures to get back home!

name: ChibiTama
description: Deploy your players and supporters, and band together to survive the stages! As you do so, your characters will grow! Little cute characters are waiting for you! Stay tuned for more features and characters to be added soon!

name: Netspectre
description: Netspectre is a hacker roguelike set in a ruthless, cyberpunk universe. Infiltrate networks, improve your machine, navigate the challenges of daily life as a netspectre in a futuristic megacity, and perhaps even become one of its many legends!

name: Those Who Rule
description: Join three fresh recruits caught in a web of betrayal as war looms over the land. Lead your band of heroes through tactical turn-based battles, master unique abilities, and forge powerful gear to turn the tide of battle. Will you unravel the conspiracy driving the conflict—or be consumed by it?

name: Twilight Wars
description: Twilight Wars is a dungeon crawler set in a cyberpunk world where secret agents battle for corporate interests. Bring back a secret organization, recruit and equip a team of specialists - and eliminate those who stand in your way!

name: Cultivation Story: Reincarnation
description: Cultivation Story: Reincarnation is a top-down pixel art style action roguelike based on cultivation and Chinese mythology.

name: Idle Spiral
description: This is a beautiful "Idle", "Incremental" game based on spirals and mathematics. Your goal is to make the spiral grow farther and farther from the origin. The game is very simple, but it is very deep and can be enjoyed for a long time!

name: Out of Hands
description: Out of Hands is a card-based thriller that blends card battles, video collage and psychological horror. With nightmarish roguelike elements and live-action visuals made out of the real hands of the developer, the game provides an intriguing and spine-chilling experience that leads you to combat the mental struggles and retrieve the lost memory.

name: Tendryll
description: Delve into grid-based card play in this roguelike deckbuilder. Assemble your party, carefully select your battles, and construct powerful item builds to cleanse the Tendryll of its befouled enemies.

name: Trailmappers
description: Trailmakers is full of adventures! But after awhile, the same maps start getting old. Now with modding, a new era has emerged. An era of creation from the community not bound to just vehicles. No longer are we limited to stock maps -- it's time to create your own adventures with Trailmappers!

name: Paws and Leaves: A Last Tale
description: Life flashes before your eyes when you die. Help Me Fox by finding his memories beyond life and experiencing a touching, cute, and scary tale.

name: To the Stars
description: Explore a strange galaxy, recruit funky aliens and discover weird worlds! Fight off hostile warships in exciting and easy-to-understand space combat! Most importantly, give your flock of gullible tourists the space tour of a lifetime…

name: M.S. Salmon
description: The game takes place in an antropomorphic world in the late 1960’s where our protagonist Ben Hearnden, a penguin detective, has to solve a murder case on a luxury ship called M.S. Salmon. While he collects the evidences on the ship, he isn’t only coming closer to the truth of the case, but also lighting up his own dark past. M. S Salmon is an interactive 2d animation film combined with minigames such as railshooter-levels, point & click and gastro sim.

name: Jasper and the City of Lights
description: Let me tell you a story my friend. It is the journey of Jasper and a fallen star into the whispering forest to find his sister Nora. In the deepest of shadows an ancient spirit is lurking but there’s hope shining from the horizon: The City of Lights.

name: Saga of Sins
description: Saga of Sins is an unholy action-adventure where mystery meets rewarding arcade gameplay! Immerse into a world of stained glass that is stained by sin.

name: Project Morph
description: Project Morph is an isometric, souls-like, sci-fi action-RPG wit a unique player shapeshifting mechanic. Collect enemy DNA and use it to transform into various creatures, called 'Morphs'. Become your enemy, literally, and fight fire with fire!

name: Downhill Legend
description: Action-racing-fun from the creators of the legendary “SisyFox“ arcade-console, the largest gaming-controller in the world. SisyFox combines physical activity and satisfying gameplay in a unique way - and now Downhill Legend lets you explore the amazing world of SisyFox in a breathtaking race against time - with only your phone!

name: Delicious Dungeon
description: Delicious Dungeon is a combination of action-adventure and simulation game. The player is the owner of a local restaurant in a fantasy world. But to run the restaurant they have to explore dungeons full of dangers and enemies to get the ingredients needed to cook delicious meals for their guests.

name: Kona II: Brume
description: Northern Québec, 1970. A bizarre mist —the Brume— is disconnecting a rural mining village from its quiet reality. Step into the shoes of Detective Carl Faubert as he unfolds the mysteries haunting the region while battling for his own survival.

name: Doom 3
description: Based on the BFG Edition, this release features enhanced graphics, better audio with more horror effects, a checkpoint save system, and support for 3D displays and HMDs. The game also includes the previous expansion Resurrection of Evil and a new single-player expansion pack called The Lost Mission. However, things like multiplayer and the inclusion of Ultimate Doom and Doom II have been removed.

name: Unsteakable
description:
Help your cuddly friends by shooting brussel’s sprouts, chili sauce and worse.

Fight of hungry invaders who are out to eat you and your friends! Use a vast array of fearsome weapons - starting with brussel’s sprouts - to make the attackers rethink their dinner plans.

name: Hovercraft: Getaway
description:
The #1 combat racing, custom vehicle building, totally addicting, action game of the year is back, and crazier than ever!
You’re on the run! Build your custom Hovercraft. Arm it to the teeth with machine guns, lasers, rockets, and mines. Then evade, attack, and survive as long as you can to make your Getaway!

name: RimWorld: Console Edition - Digital Deluxe
description: It's designed to co-author tragic, twisted, and triumphant stories about imprisoned pirates, desperate colonists, starvation and survival. It works by controlling the “random” events that the world throws at you. Every thunderstorm, pirate raid, and travelling salesman is a card dealt into your story by the AI Storyteller.

name: A Cup of Coffee
description: Sin descripción

name: Fight In Hole
description: Sin descripción

name: A Mole in a Hole
description: Sin descripción

name: Boomer Zombie
description: Sin descripción

name: Little Islanders
description: Your people need you, and you've been summoned to protect and guide them in their time of need. You must help them settle the island that they now find themselves inhabiting. Help them build their town, protect them, and ensure that they thrive.

name: Ghostly Moans
description: Spirits have been possessing people in the kingdom and a young priestess named Mia has become well-known for her diplomatic way to exorcise these creatures. Follow her in search of the ones responsible for this situation.

name: Flibbles
description: A casual adventure in third-person perspective, battle a mysterious purple Goo preventing it from consuming Flibble Land. A unique experience about a farmer and cute intriguing creatures.

name: Crustacean Nations
description: Crustacean Nations is a real-time strategy game about total crab warfare. Build a sprawling sand castle and amass huge armies to dominate the beach and become the one true crustacean nation!

name: Cable Clutter
description: Cable Clutter is a puzzle game where objects can be connected to each other to change their behaviour. Puzzles can be solved by pressing buttons, automation, and some head scratching.

name: Fire Station Renovation
description: Fire Station Renovation is a renovator simulator for abandoned and forgotten fire stations. Buy old hovels, repaint, redecorate, clean and even build rodent traps and bring the firehouse back to life!

name: Born Anew
description: Born Anew is a 2D Platformer set in an Open world Life Simulator set in a Fantasy Medieval world full of Adventures to be had, the game has many ways to play it and it will NOT have a main Story line. Build your own Fate and Future.

name: Terror Brain: Night Out
description: Terror Brain: Night Out is a Single-Player First-Person Action-Adventure Psychological Horror PC Game where you take on the role of university student Sarah Mitchell while she is trying to understand what happened to her after everything went dark during a night out at the local bar.

name: Nightmare Hunter
description: One day in the dream, some one showed up and claimed there is a dream called paradise. From that day, dream demons that can suck human memory and spirit increased. In order to make everything return to its original state, Yoru, who awakened as a demon hunter, decided to challenge the initiator.

name: Students of Psionic Power
description: "Students of Psionic Power" is RPG based typing game. You can create your own party members (Can input name, can choose portrait for all of 5 members in ally party). 20 portraits (10 school boys and 10 school girls) are included for character creation.

name: Berserk Reborn
description: Berserk Reborn is a collectible card MMO where you will fight to rule the world of Udhin. Form squads, get legendary cards and defeat your enemies to become a legend of the world of Udhin.

name: Affinity: Fallen from Paradise
description: Journey through a broken world, discovering its long forgotten secrets. Experience a non linear story in a lore filled world, and learning new abilities to survive againist otherworldly threats. Can you make it back to Paradise?

name: Unnatural: Land of Dead
description: Unnantural: Land of Dead Its story of Unnatural things happening in a Land where there are Dead/Undead everywhere you go & where ever you look.

name: Red Nivis
description: A rogue-like metroidvania where you explore the ruins of the Red Nivis Laboratory. No run will be the same, but will also give you the metroidvania feeling of finding a shortcut, or remembering that there's a cool area you can now explore.

name: Chess, but...
description: Play against a low level engine, simulating a 100 rated player, while completing challenges. Multiple difficulty modes make the game suitable for chess beginners and experts.

name: Excommunicado
description: Rogue-lite deck-builder set in the gritty film-noir world of assassins and killers. Play as one of 5 unique specialists, power up with permanent upgrades, beat the game and then strap in for the next ride with end-game modifiers for near limitless challenge.

name: Sovereign Syndicate
description: Victorian steampunk RPG with tarot cards instead of dice. Investigate the disappearance of society’s most vulnerable to uncover a mysterious cult. Play as three characters, each with their own skills and motivations. Customize your characters with narrative choices to unlock new tarot cards.

name: Alchem It
description: Become an alchemist shopkeeper and serve potions to your customers. Master your tools to gather many ingredients and brew potions as fast as you can. Unlock new tools, levels and decorate your dream alchemy shop.

name: Skate Shop Simulator
description: Build, run & create your own Skate Shops. Renovate, upgrade and expand your services and create your own shopping empire! Skate Shop Simulator allows you to create and run your own skate shop network.

name: Street Artist Simulator
description: Become a street artist, let art set you free! Street Artist Simulator is an open-world action game where you’re a writer. Find spots, draw graffiti and become a legend. Just remember, don’t get busted.

name: Primal Hunger
description: Hunt or be hunted. Eat or be eaten. Evolve or die. Grow stronger and evolve with each victory on your way to becoming the Alpha Predator in this thrilling battle royale.

name: Project Death Strikers
description: Death Striker is a Couch Co-op, run'n'gun shooter. Fight through the hordes of enemies. Take out punishing bosses to find out what caused the mutation. Your choices will decide how this apocalypse ends.

name: Ants Took My Eyeball
description: Ants Took My Eyeball is a 2D action platformer roguelite. Descend in to an ever changing ant hill, fight your way through hordes of insects with a variety of weapons, face formidable bosses and ultimately find your stolen eyeball.

name: Wake of Ragnarok
description: An action-rpg where some survived Ragnarok, the end of the world. Explore, find new equipment, upgrade your skills and bring the fight to the hordes of enemies and bosses standing in your way of getting home to Asgard.

name: Welcome to Chornobayivka VR
description: At that day the Russians start a miss planed attack against the Ukraine, Joe grabs his preferred weapon to stop the Zombie Russian Soldiers that got infected by a sick experiment of Putin. Fight for democracy and freedom in a wave like horror VR shooter experience for free.

name: Herald of Havoc
description: Herald of Havoc is an FPS that merges the fast-paced gameplay of the 90's era shooters, with the crazy capabilities of what can be done today. Destroy hundreds of enemies with a crazy arsenal that includes classics weapons as well as things like Power-fists, ChainShotgun, Ultra Cannon, and more.

name: Ziircon
description: Ziircon is a RPG rogue-lite platformer, with procedurally generated mind-bending, bone-breaking dungeons. You rise from the dead, an average squire. You die and rise evermore to defeat what corrupted the world. The entire world crushes you over and over. Can you prevail over this challenge?

name: Sophonce
description: Sophonce is a science fiction psychological horror first-person shooter that relies on philosophical undertones as the primary focus of the plot.
